lines.name: Mageblood

explicitModifiers.text: Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used
Leftmost (2-4) Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you
Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed

lines.flavourText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

lines.name: Demigod's Dominance
lines.flavourText: SSF Synthesis Event #9 Gladiator

lines.name: Original Sin

explicitModifiers.text: All Elemental Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Innocence rose to godhood not on inspired faith,
but on the vilification and hatred of another.

lines.name: Headhunter

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Original Scripture

explicitModifiers.text: The Herald of the Scourge drops the Original Sin
Cannot be used with Forbidden Tomes below level 83
This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

lines.flavourText: "It's all here. The lie at the core of my faith. Maxarius was not the first chosen of Innocence. Maxarius was Innocence himself. A charlatan, a liar, and a power-seeker." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.name: Kalandra's Touch
lines.flavourText:
On one hand, you have a choice.
On the other, you have its twin.

lines.name: Hateforge

lines.flavourText:

developed a blood fever born of corruption.

explicitModifiers.text: (81-100)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

speaking only in strange tongues. They prayed to a new
symbol of power, not out of love, but out of fear.

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks per 80 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Starving test subject became completely incapable of exerting force.
However, after being fed, he began to poison everything he touched..."

lines.name: Uul-Netol's Vow

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Support Gems can also Support Skills from Equipped Body Armour

lines.flavourText:
The time is nigh.
War has come.
We dream as one.

lines.name: Kingmaker

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Allies have 30% increased Item Rarity
Insufficient Mana doesn't prevent your Melee Attacks
Nearby Allies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier

lines.flavourText:
A King and his people are linked together
like a soul and a beating heart.
Both can be severed by a same edge, 
then forged anew.

lines.name: Dialla's Malefaction

explicitModifiers.text: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience

lines.flavourText:
He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

lines.name: Crown of the Tyrant

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies have -10% to all Resistances
You and Nearby Allies have 64 to 96 added Fire Damage per Red Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 56 to 88 added Cold Damage per Green Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 16 to 144 added Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 47 to 61 added Chaos Damage per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
You will know if your subjects follow you from fear
or respect when you have your first moment of weakness.
If it's the former, they will tear you into pieces like rabid dogs.

We share one space,

Brittle.

lines.name: Uzaza's Valley
lines.flavourText:
Sheltered beneath thick ice,
the river ferried fat fish towards the sea.
But the First King knew the river's secret,
and the fish were not the only ones who grew fat.

lines.flavourText:
On the mirrored edge of infinity,
one man sinks forever into darkness,
one man rises into light.
But which one am I?

lines.flavourText:

ache of love disremembered...

lines.flavourText:
My Soul is your Strength
My Price is your Blood

lines.name: Voltaxic Rift

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Lightning Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Hits with this Weapon Shock Enemies as though dealing 300% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
The eldritch storm descended upon us, and bruised lightning
rained down. Metal withered and flesh melted before its
arcane power. There was no escape, no shelter. Only despair.

lines.name: Presence of Chayula

explicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: The dreamer stirs, the world trembles.

lines.name: Saqawal's Nest

explicitModifiers.text: (12-20)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
100% increased Aspect of the Avian Buff Effect
Aspect of the Avian also grants Avian's Might and Avian's Flight to nearby Allies
+(120-150) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed,
that what we take for law may just be an illusion.

lines.flavourText:
"Lab Two suffered significant structural damage in the process of creating
Prototype #77. It is, however, the closest we've come to perfection."

lines.name: Briskwrap

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: The Iron Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 50 Strength
Chance to Block Spell Damage is Unlucky

Strength's Damage Bonus instead grants 3% increased Melee
Physical Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Stand steadfast in the face of destruction.
The Council cannot afford to falter."
- Mauritius, the Iron Heart

lines.name: Putembo's Mountain
lines.flavourText:
He surveyed his lands, green and vital,
watched with pride as his slaves quarried fine stone for his fortress,
and thanked the heavens for his many blessings.
But this pilgrimage to the peak was to be his last.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

act through one body.
A flawless crystal.
Brittle.

lines.name: Defiance of Destiny

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (25-42)% of Missing Unreserved Life before being Hit by an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
The farmer was struck again and again, but he refused to stay down.
Astonished, the raiding warlord ordered the man's family spared.

lines.name: Rakiata's Dance

explicitModifiers.text: Treats Enemy Monster Elemental Resistance values as inverted

lines.flavourText: In the shifting reflections of the sea, the truth of the soul can be seen.

lines.name: Disintegrator

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Maximum Siphoning Charges per Elder or Shaper Item Equipped
25% chance to gain a Siphoning Charge when you use a Skill
Adds (12-13) to (15-16) Physical Damage to Attacks and Spells per Siphoning Charge
Gain 4% of Non-Chaos Damage as extra Chaos Damage per Siphoning Charge
1% additional Physical Damage Reduction from Hits per Siphoning Charge
0.2% of Damage Leeched as Life per Siphoning Charge
Take 150 Physical Damage per Second per Siphoning Charge if you've used a Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Blurred is the boundary
between creator and destroyer.

You have Phasing while you have Cat's Stealth

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Plains was the First of the Hunt
It was she who showed us that there is honour
in waiting in the shadows and picking your moment.

lines.name: Uul-Netol's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Bone Nova when you Hit a Bleeding Enemy
25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
At last she holds us,
and so we turn to dust.

lines.name: Entropic Devastation

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% increased Effect of Impales inflicted with Spells
Critical Strikes with Spells inflict Impale

lines.flavourText:
A legion of lives claimed
by the shards of obliterated worlds.

lines.name: The Surrender
lines.flavourText:
Our hearts cry out
but are silenced by our flesh
and so we give up our flesh.

lines.name: Replica Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
Gain an Endurance Charge when you are Hit
Lose 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #7 achieved even greater injury responsiveness than expected,
though at considerable cost to the long-term survival rate of the user."

lines.name: Carcass Jack
lines.flavourText:
"...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Death's Harp
lines.flavourText:
The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

lines.name: Divinarius

explicitModifiers.text: (200-250)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells if you've Killed Recently
+(60-100)% to Critical Strike Multiplier for Spells if you haven't Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
Divine intervention feels better
when you do it yourself.

lines.name: Hyrri's Ire

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (105-145) to (160-200) Added Cold Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: Lioneye's Glare

implicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"See without doubt, slay without hesitation."
- Marceus Lioneye of Sarn

lines.name: Pledge of Hands

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Greater Spell Echo

lines.flavourText:
"To shake a hand is to double your power."
- Jaetai, Queen's Advisor

lines.name: Queen of the Forest

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals

lines.flavourText:
Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

lines.name: Starforge

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Area of Effect for Attacks

lines.flavourText: The end is written into the beginning.

lines.name: The Brass Dome

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.flavourText:
We share one space,

act through one body.

Brittle.

lines.flavourText:

beneath which all are buried.

lines.flavourText:
"The world is not simply black and white,
it is not divided into good and evil.
But black and white, good and evil, do exist,
and we must know how to recognize them."
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Oni-Goroshi

lines.flavourText:
"Your name is Demon Slayer? Really? Good name for rotgut, that."
She said: I prefer "The Goddess Of Swords". Much more dignified. And accurate.
"Demon Slayer The Cheap And Nasty it is then. Burns going down, burns coming up?"
She said: Every single time, Charan. And still...you'll bathe me, and you'll drink my love. Until you can't.

Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi. 
It mattered little. When Erqi's maul fell true, so did its target.

War is a thriving infection.
It numbs the heart and eats away at the soul
until only emptiness remains.

Whether in one day or in ten thousand years,
eventually the rock will crumble,
and the Brine King's domain will grow.

lines.flavourText:
Exceptional men and women of strong will can flicker a spark, 
but something much greater is needed to unleash the wildfire of true divine flames.

lines.name: Gruthkul's Pelt
lines.flavourText: Simple is the life of the bear.

lines.name: Marohi Erqi
lines.flavourText:
Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi. 
It mattered little. When Erqi's maul fell true, so did its target.

For the immortal, what is the difference
between an age and an instant?

lines.name: The Hour of Divinity

This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

lines.flavourText: "They ascended together, one unwillingly. The vilified became black as coal, and the lauded, golden. After a lifetime of ambition, he finally had his heart's desire. It only cost him his brother." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.name: Utula's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text: +(702-1000) to maximum Life if there are no Life Modifiers on other Equipped Items

lines.flavourText: The world will end in a divine stomach once Kitava has eaten all that lives.

lines.name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around.

"The form of this replica came to me in a troubled dream.
I do not believe we should ever allow it to be used."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: The Gluttonous Tide

lines.flavourText:
To eat, to feast, to forget the horror of endless agonising existence
if but for a moment... only to disgorge and do it all again...

lines.name: Storm Cloud
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire
into very effective lightning rods.

"The world is not simply black and white,

But black and white, good and evil, do exist,
and we must know how to recognize them."
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

Their last thoughts were not of their friends,

Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

lines.name: Crest of Desire
lines.flavourText: Expand one single ambition to crystal clarity... and beyond.

lines.name: Replica Dreamfeather
lines.flavourText:
"Once we armoured the test subject heavily enough to test Prototype #502, he proceeded
to fight his way out. I don't know what we expected." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: The Annihilating Light

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills

lines.flavourText:
There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

lines.flavourText:
"The newcomers warn of doom and death beyond mortal ken.
I ask, why should we fear the fire when we serve the Lord of Light?"
- Maxarius, the first High Templar

Mortal pleasures can hold back the memories,
but a hollow soul can never be healed.

lines.flavourText:
Seek not to avoid the mortal pains of this world.
In flagellation, there lies freedom from temptation.

lines.flavourText:
She thinks and we act.
She acts and we think.
Fragments of the whole that washes clean the skies.

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Plains was the First of the Hunt
It was she who showed us that there is honour
in waiting in the shadows and picking your moment.

his strikes land long after he is gone.

Reap what others have sown

- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

Exalted by the few.

Laughing.

Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

lines.name: Quill Rain
lines.flavourText:

When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch

Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

Exalted by the few.

lines.name: Fated End

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Skills have (8-14)% increased Cast Speed
Non-Aura Hexes expire upon reaching (180-220)% of base Effect
Non-Aura Hexes gain 20% increased Effect per second

lines.flavourText: All roads lead to that destined doom.

lines.name: Blackflame

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-14)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
Enemies Ignited by you take Chaos Damage instead of Fire Damage from Ignite
Withered does not expire on Enemies Ignited by you

lines.flavourText:
Beyond the veil of death, there burns a fire
by whose light night is borne.

lines.name: Cane of Kulemak

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
+(8-15)% to Quality of Socketed Support Gems
15% chance to Trigger Level 1 Blood Rage when you Kill an Enemy
+(70-91)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
+(70-91)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
+(70-91)% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier

Trigger a Socketed Spell on Using a Skill, with a 4 second Cooldown
Spells Triggered this way have 150% more Cost
+(70-91)% to Physical Damage over Time Multiplier
+(86-114)% Critical Strike Multiplier while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate (22-30)% Chaos Resistance
Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate (22-30)% Elemental Resistances
(57-76)% chance to deal Double Damage while Focused
(43-57)% increased Attack Speed while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
(24-28)% chance to gain Arcane Surge when you Kill an Enemy
(33-47)% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
(33-47)% chance to Blind Enemies on hit
Gain (14-19)% of Non-Chaos Damage as extra Chaos Damage
(33-47)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
Chaos Skills have (41-57)% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Stolen power is still power.

lines.name: Legacy of Fury

explicitModifiers.text:
(30-40)% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding
Enemy for 4 seconds, dealing 8% of the Killed Enemy's Life as Fire Damage per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was loved, all that was hated -
naught remains but ash.

lines.name: Tinkerskin

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for throwing Traps
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
30% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 100 Life when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 50 Energy Shield when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Thin is the line between mechanical genius and magic.

lines.name: Jorrhast's Blacksteel

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 20 Animate Weapon on Kill
Weapons you Animate create an additional copy

lines.flavourText:
His flesh had long turned to dust,
but his vengeance lived on
in every scrap of iron he touched.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Spell Totem
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Replica Trypanon

explicitModifiers.text: This Weapon's Critical Strike Chance is 100%

lines.flavourText: "The best place for this prototype would be in the hands of our enemies."

lines.name: Roth's Reach

explicitModifiers.text: (60-80)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Exiled to the sea; what a joke. 
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

lines.name: Hrimnor's Hymn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

lines.name: The Annihilating Light

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills

lines.flavourText:
There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

lines.name: Sinvicta's Mettle

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Area of Effect per 25 Rampage Kills
Gain a Frenzy Charge on every 50th Rampage Kill

lines.flavourText:
War is a thriving infection.
It numbs the heart and eats away at the soul
until only emptiness remains.

lines.name: Hyrri's Ire

explicitModifiers.text: (105-145) to (160-200) Added Cold Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Null's Inclination

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Socketed Minion Spells on Kill with this Weapon
Minion Spells Triggered by this Item have a 0.25 second Cooldown with 5 Uses
Minions deal 1% increased Damage per 5 Dexterity

lines.flavourText: The hunt continues when the prey falls.

lines.name: Silverbranch

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

lines.flavourText:
"The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui

lines.name: Storm Cloud
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire
into very effective lightning rods.

lines.name: Replica Soul Tether

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (4-7)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
"Curious. The test spike penetrated the subject's flesh, but the chest wound
was not as deep as expected. There is something here..."

lines.name: Graven's Secret

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Minimum Power Charges instead apply to Minimum Absorption Charges
Maximum Absorption Charges is equal to Maximum Power Charges
Gain Absorption Charges instead of Power Charges

lines.flavourText: The cowardly thinker's greatest success is simply surviving.

lines.name: Agnerod North

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Hiltless

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Lifetap
Enemies you Attack Reflect 100 Physical Damage to you

lines.flavourText:
The cuts on my hands are a small price to pay
for the opportunity to drive my steel
beyond the flesh and into the demon's soul.

lines.name: Dawnstrider

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Effect of Buffs your Ancestor Totems grant while Active
Buffs from Active Ancestor Totems Linger for 4 seconds
Maximum 1 Buff from an Active Ancestor Totem at a time

lines.flavourText:
In a void strewn with incandescent stardust,
the emissary of flame traverses interplanetary space
consuming the knowledge of fallen civilisations.

lines.name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. 
Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

lines.name: Sire of Shards

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems fire Projectiles in a circle

lines.flavourText: That which was broken may yet break.

lines.name: Voidwalker

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Avoid Projectiles while Phasing
You have Phasing if you've Killed Recently
Projectiles Pierce 5 additional Targets while you have Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Step into the void
and experience true freedom.

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to (4-12) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Agnerod North

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Infractem
lines.flavourText:
Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Rigwald's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Today, clansmen, my sword is my voice!"
- Rigwald, at the Battle of Glarryn

lines.name: Tremor Rod

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Spell Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Blastchain Mine
Mines can be Detonated an additional time

lines.flavourText:
The best way to gain the element of surprise,
is to let your enemy learn your plans,
and execute them - twice.

lines.name: Cospri's Will

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse
Your Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
Always Poison on Hit against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Curse their vile Council,
They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.
If they only knew the power I possess.

lines.name: Iron Commander

explicitModifiers.text: Siege Ballista has +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems per 200 Dexterity
Adds 1 to 3 Physical Damage to Attacks per 25 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
The Eternals commanded an army that need not eat, sleep, or breathe
without the usual depravities of necromancy.

lines.name: Marohi Erqi
lines.flavourText:
Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi. 
It mattered little. When Erqi's maul fell true, so did its target.

lines.name: Seven-League Step
lines.flavourText:
"Death can be outrun with these, but beware!
In running from death, you may forget to live."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 202

lines.name: The Dancing Dervish

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 15 Manifest Dancing Dervishes on Rampage
Manifested Dancing Dervishes disables both weapon slots
Manifested Dancing Dervishes die when Rampage ends

Melee Hits count as Rampage Kills
Rampage

lines.flavourText:
Take your partners by the hand,
Keep your steps in time.
Swing together, spin apart,
And dance with death sublime.

lines.name: Putembo's Valley
lines.flavourText:
With no stone for rebuilding, each storm took its toll on the village.
Huts eventually collapsed, their occupants injured or dead.
Bodies were left by the river, to appease the gods.
But the dead would not remain there.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Meadow and Mountain ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Uzaza's Meadow
lines.flavourText:
Cold winds blasted what little grew on the icy surface.
The gifts of the land lay hidden deeper,
and only patience and persistence would free them.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Mountain and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Breathstealer

explicitModifiers.text: Create a Blighted Spore when your Skills or Minions Kill a Rare Monster

lines.flavourText:
The last gasp is not always one's final act.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Cowl of the Thermophile

explicitModifiers.text: Can have a second Enchantment Modifier

lines.flavourText:
The villagers seared the blight with fire, but it only spread like dancing flames.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Hands of the High Templar

explicitModifiers.text: Can have up to 5 Implicit Modifiers while Item has this Modifier

lines.flavourText: The laws of the faith do not apply to its leader.

lines.name: Replica Atziri's Foible

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText:
"A rare unequivocal success, Prototype #11 causes wounds to heal so quickly
the type Delta test subject actually survived the entire testing regimen."

lines.name: Replica Kongor's Undying Rage

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage
Regenerate 20% of Energy Shield per second if you've dealt a Critical Strike with this weapon Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #599 offers an incredible defensive power, but at a cost.
What underlying physics are at play here, I wonder?"

lines.name: Replica Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Shade Form when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Elder Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
"The form of this replica came to me in a troubled dream.
I do not believe we should ever allow it to be used."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Replica Nebulis

explicitModifiers.text: (15-20)% increased Cold Damage per 1% Missing Cold Resistance, up to a maximum of 300%
(15-20)% increased Fire Damage per 1% Missing Fire Resistance, up to a maximum of 300%

lines.flavourText:
"We could rival the gods with this power, if only we had the mitigating mechanisms
to make it work. A jewel, a talisman, an armour... or the Font..."

lines.name: Replica Windripper

implicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Frozen by you take 20% increased Damage
+(90-120) Energy Shield gained on Killing a Shocked Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"Beware. Prototype #91 is haunted by a strange miasma,
an odour of evil. Nothing can shield the senses." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Gravebind

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies Killed by anyone count as being Killed by you instead

lines.flavourText:
Try as you like to hide the
blood on your hands.
You'll still know the truth.

lines.name: Polaric Devastation

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Left Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Ash for 5 seconds when you Ignite them
Right Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Frost for 5 seconds when you Freeze them

lines.flavourText:
Those that escaped the annihilating light
sank eternally into crushing darkness.

lines.name: Inextricable Fate

explicitModifiers.text: You gain 3 Grasping Vines when you take a Critical Strike
Nearby stationary Enemies gain a Grasping Vine every 0.5 seconds
All Damage inflicts Poison against Enemies affected by at least 3 Grasping Vines
You take (30-50)% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes by Poisoned Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A multitude of beings share a wretched existence
irrevocably bound together in perpetual torture.

lines.name: Queen's Decree

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Hymn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

lines.name: Geofri's Baptism
lines.flavourText:
"One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

lines.name: Dying Breath

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 18% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
18% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
Nearby Enemies have 18% increased Effect of Curses on them
18% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
The whispers of the dead
Carry wisdom for the living,
If you are willing to give your life
To listen.

lines.name: Shaper's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: -(15-10) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
1000% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Oro's Sacrifice

implicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy Charge if an Attack Ignites an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Give yourself to the flames and your name
will burn in the minds of men forever.

lines.name: Yriel's Fostering

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Snake Skill
Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Ursa Skill
Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Rhoa Skill
Projectile Attack Skills have (43-60)% increased Critical Strike Chance

Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to Poison on Hit while
you have a Bestial Minion

Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to inflict Bleeding on Hit while
you have a Bestial Minion

Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to Maim on Hit while
you have a Bestial Minion
Adds (14-19) to (24-25) Chaos Damage to Attacks while you have a Bestial Minion
(10-15)% increased Attack and Movement Speed while you have a Bestial Minion
Adds (11-12) to (22-24) Physical Damage to Attacks while you have a Bestial Minion

lines.flavourText:
Feed a beast and it will not hunt.
Protect it and it will not fight.
Ferocity must be learned, not taught.
It is suffering that forges the greatest warriors.

lines.name: Bronn's Lithe

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Movement Gems

lines.flavourText:
Forget your kite shield. Just put the biggest man
 in the field between you and the archers.

lines.name: Edge of Madness

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems
Adds 1 to 2 Physical Damage to Attacks per Level

lines.flavourText:
Soon, the pleas for mercy were muted.
Only one voice remained.
Laughing.

lines.name: The Stormheart

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Avoid being Shocked while Chilled

lines.flavourText:
When the storm comes,
the safest place to be is the centre.

lines.name: Agnerod East

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Astramentis

explicitModifiers.text: -4 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Mindless rage will shake the world,
Cunning lies will bend it.
Reckless haste will break the world,
And into darkness send it.

lines.name: Femurs of the Saints

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
+1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per Summoned Skeleton
2% increased Attack and Cast Speed per Summoned Raging Spirit
Regenerate 0.6% of Life per second for each Raised Zombie
30% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Raised Spectre

lines.flavourText:
"They spent a lifetime in the service of God, 
only to spend eternity in the service of me." 
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: +1000 to Evasion Rating while on Full Life
30% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects 30 Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
100% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: Realmshaper

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Cold to Fire

lines.flavourText:
"God's creations always begin and end
with flames and ice.
We should count ourselves lucky when we see neither."
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Redblade Banner
lines.flavourText: Blood shed is blood shared.

lines.name: The Goddess Scorned

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Ignites you inflict deal Damage 50% faster
You can only deal Damage with this Weapon or Ignite

lines.flavourText:
Her purpose seems done; the oath is fulfilled.
Rust dulls her smirk with the last demon killed.
The embers grow dim and yet hope burns her lips:
"An old flame renewed can define our eclipse!"

lines.name: Victario's Influence

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 45% increased Reservation Efficiency
(20-40)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Chance to Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

lines.name: Cane of Unravelling

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-55)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
2% increased Cast Speed per Power Charge
+2 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
Gain a Power Charge after Spending a total of 200 Mana
Regenerate 2 Mana per Second per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Creation is the act of making the intangible tangible.
To work backwards, to make the tangible intangible,
is to step into the mind of a god."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: The Siege
lines.flavourText:
As the dead battered Highgate's barricades,
The Black Sekhema accepted her fate,
And stood her ground.

lines.name: Replica Perfect Form

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Overcapped Cold Resistance
Flesh and Stone has no Reservation

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject battered through the hatch with her bare hands,
forcing us to resort to threatening her children to restore containment."

lines.flavourText:
"Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: Garukhan's Flight

explicitModifiers.text: Immune to Burning Ground, Shocked Ground and Chilled Ground
Regenerate 100 Life per second while moving

lines.flavourText: The higher you soar, the further you must fall.

lines.name: Cherrubim's Maleficence

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The Consort of Chaos descended,
swiftly, brutally, artfully, she consumed the living,
leaving naught behind but a Rosemarie bloom,
to celebrate the massacre."
- Blass, explorer, hunter, adventurer

lines.name: Maloney's Mechanism

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Replica Kaom's Heart
lines.flavourText:
"Useless for our purposes, but perhaps we can sell Prototype #5
to an archmage to fund other experiments."

lines.name: Null's Inclination

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Socketed Minion Spells on Kill with this Weapon
Minion Spells Triggered by this Item have a 0.25 second Cooldown with 5 Uses
Minions deal 1% increased Damage per 5 Dexterity

lines.flavourText: The hunt continues when the prey falls.

lines.name: Wideswing

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Increased Area of Effect

lines.flavourText:
Bargg Wurmkin once severed the heads 
of seven men in a single cleave.

lines.name: Reaper's Pursuit

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Accept your fate, or lie, pretend.
Death collects you in the end.

lines.name: Soul Ascension

explicitModifiers.text: Eat a Soul when you Hit a Unique Enemy, no more than once every second
Lose an Eaten Soul every 3 seconds while no Unique Enemy is in your Presence

lines.flavourText: Fear can be instilled by the smallest entity.

lines.name: Nuro's Harp

explicitModifiers.text: 15% chance to create Chilled Ground when you Freeze an Enemy
Create Consecrated Ground when you Shatter an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Night's frost becomes morning's dew
Darkness cleansed, pure and new.

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: (75-150)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(60-30) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Bino's Kitchen Knife

explicitModifiers.text: On Killing a Poisoned Enemy, nearby Enemies are Poisoned
and nearby Allies Regenerate 200 Life per second

lines.flavourText:
Calling it poison would imply
that it was even edible.

lines.name: Bloodseeker

implicitModifiers.text: 1.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: 1.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Life Leech from Hits with this Weapon is instant

lines.flavourText:
"For the life of the flesh will always be in the blood."
- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

lines.name: Geofri's Baptism
lines.flavourText:
"One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

lines.name: Limbsplit

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems
Trigger Level 1 Gore Shockwave on Melee Hit if you have at least 150 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.

lines.name: Lioneye's Vision

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pierce
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
"The Virtue Gems are a gift from the land, 
our land, and we will not let our gifts
be destroyed by savages."
- Marceus Lioneye

lines.name: Pledge of Hands

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Greater Spell Echo

lines.flavourText:
"To shake a hand is to double your power."
- Jaetai, Queen's Advisor

lines.name: The Magnate

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to deal Double Damage while you have at least 200 Strength
5% chance to deal Triple Damage while you have at least 400 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Few men cast a longer shadow
 than the Great Meginord of the North.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate 75 Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Trypanon

explicitModifiers.text: This Weapon's Critical Strike Chance is 100%

lines.flavourText:
"Though ingenious instruments have been found,
it seems surgery before thaumaturgy
was not so delicate."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3546

lines.name: Arakaali's Fang

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Trigger Level 1 Raise Spiders on Kill

lines.flavourText: All children must eat.

lines.name: The Anticipation
lines.flavourText:
We are within her reach,
and when the time is right,
she will reach into us.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Uul-Netol}

lines.name: Ryslatha's Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (15-24) Physical Damage to Attacks
Gain (50-60) Life when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
All creatures have the potential for greatness
or unequivocal failure.

lines.name: The Unshattered Will

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of Focus Skill

lines.flavourText:
<<HBGAh>><<HBG01>><<HBGAe>><<HBG00>><<HBGAp>>
<<HBGAa>><<HBG02>><<HBGAq>><<HBGAr>><<HBG03>><<HBGAl>>
<<HBGAa>><<HBG01>><<HBGAs>><<HBG00>><<HBG04>><<HBGAt>>

lines.name: The Poet's Pen

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems per 25 Player Levels
Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with this Weapon, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Adds 3 to 5 Physical Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 3 Player Levels

lines.flavourText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic.

lines.name: Magna Eclipsis

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Elemental Aegis when Equipped
+(80-100) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Lunaris crossed silently, shining and full, 
Softly night left her, alone and forlorn.
Solaris rose to meet her, feeling her pull.
'Neath the midday sun, the night was reborn.

lines.name: Indigon

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (8-10)% of Life when you use a Mana Flask
Non-instant Mana Recovery from Flasks is also Recovered as Life
(50-60)% increased Cost of Skills for each 200 total Mana Spent Recently
(20-25)% increased Spell Damage for each 200 total Mana you have Spent Recently, up to 2000%

lines.flavourText:
Where the body's limits begin,
the mind's limits end.

lines.name: Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

lines.name: Ahkeli's Meadow
lines.flavourText:
Where once had stood a village, lay naught but splinters.
Some had once been her home. 
Some had once been her creations.
Some had once been her family.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Mountain and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Vivinsect

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems have 20% reduced Reservation Efficiency
(3-4)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(3-4)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
(3-4)% chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
Regenerate (15-18) Life per second for each Uncorrupted Item Equipped
Focus has (5-8)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
-2 to Total Mana Cost of Skills for each Corrupted Item Equipped
Shock nearby Enemies for 4 Seconds when you Focus

lines.flavourText:
"Fusing the parasite with another ring has manifested unpredictable effects.
I theorise the sacrificial vessel's level of anguish is a key variable."
- Arzaak, Syndicate Researcher

lines.name: Cowl of the Cryophile

explicitModifiers.text: Can have a second Enchantment Modifier

lines.flavourText:
The villagers seared the blight with cold, but it only bloomed countless spears.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Mother's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Your Minions use your Flasks when summoned
Minions have (25-40)% reduced Flask Charges used
Minions have (50-80)% increased Flask Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Drink, my children, and be strengthened.

lines.name: Natural Affinity
lines.flavourText:
You can take the girl out of the woods, 
but you can't take the woods out of the girl.

lines.name: The Interrogation
lines.flavourText:
Pain is a fine motivator,
But if you seek the truth,
Fear of pain unknown has no parallel.

lines.name: Perfidy

explicitModifiers.text: You can have two different Banners at the same time
Banners you are carrying gain 1 Stage on Melee Hit, up to 5 per second
War Banner has (107-200)% increased Adrenaline duration
Dread Banner grants an additional +(2-4) to maximum Fortification when placing the Banner
Defiance Banner has (103-199)% increased Taunt duration

lines.flavourText:
The Trickster God turned the very Day and Night against each other.
What hope have you?

lines.name: Replica Hyrri's Truth

explicitModifiers.text: Hatred has 100% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText:
"The type Delta test subjects could have escaped with the power offered by
Prototype #15, but they suddenly chose to murder each other instead..."

lines.name: Replica Tasalio's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (15-24) to (25-42) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (60-72) to (80-96) Cold Damage against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
"Likely our closest to the original, yet Prototype #22 still falls short.
Are these objects actually somehow resisting our efforts?"

lines.name: Replica Mistwall

explicitModifiers.text: +75% Chance to Block Spell Damage if you have not Blocked Recently
+(8-15)% chance to Avoid Physical Damage from Hits while Phasing
You have Phasing if you have Blocked Recently

lines.flavourText:
"For personal defence, Prototype #444 is fantastic. It is one hundred percent
effective seventy five percent of the time... once." 
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.name: Replica Inya's Epiphany

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 0.5% of Life per second per Power Charge
5% increased Movement Speed per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #56 was deemed safe, but judging by Administrator Qotra's new hustle
and improved ability to micromanage us, I'm not so sure." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Replica Stampede

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Travel Skills deal 80% more Damage
(30-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while moving
Your Movement Speed is 150% of its base value

lines.name: The Iron Mass

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% chance to inflict Withered for 2 seconds on Hit with this Weapon
Summoned Skeleton Warriors and Soldiers wield this Weapon while in your Main Hand

Summoned Skeleton Warriors and Soldiers deal Triple Damage with this
Weapon if you've Hit with this Weapon Recently

lines.flavourText: Lead by example.

lines.name: Font of Thunder

explicitModifiers.text: 40% of Cold Damage taken as Lightning Damage
40% of Fire Damage taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText: The lightning fears not the flame.

lines.name: Replica Atziri's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: You have Perfect Agony if you've dealt a Critical Strike recently

lines.flavourText:
"One of our researchers cut himself on Prototype #2,
and he has not stopped screaming for months..."

lines.name: Replica Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: You can Cast an additional Brand
20% increased Critical Strike Chance per Brand

lines.flavourText:
"As one of our few creations that did not cost any fatalities,
Prototype #10 bore unexpectedly positive results."

lines.name: Arn's Anguish

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Minimum Endurance Charges instead apply to Minimum Brutal Charges
Maximum Brutal Charges is equal to Maximum Endurance Charges
Gain Brutal Charges instead of Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText: The tortured thinker is made heavier by the weight of his guilt.

lines.name: Yaomac's Accord

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge, Frenzy Charge, and Power Charge when you use a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText: Their three serpentine heads found unity in balance.

lines.name: Voidfletcher

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Consumes a Void Charge to Trigger Level 20 Void Shot when you fire Arrows with a Non-Triggered Skill
Adds (30-40) to (80-100) Cold Damage to Attacks
Gain a Void Charge every 0.5 seconds

lines.flavourText: Even emptiness may be harnessed.

lines.name: The Gluttonous Tide

explicitModifiers.text: Lose all Frenzy Charges on reaching Maximum Frenzy Charges to make the next Bow Attack you perform fire that many additional Arrows
+(30-50)% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have a Frenzy Charge
(20-40)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
To eat, to feast, to forget the horror of endless agonising existence
if but for a moment... only to disgorge and do it all again...

lines.name: Olesya's Delight

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Minimum Frenzy Charges instead apply to Minimum Affliction Charges
Maximum Affliction Charges is equal to Maximum Frenzy Charges
Gain Affliction Charges instead of Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText: The cruel thinker finds glee in torture most precise.

lines.name: Contract: The Twins
lines.flavourText:
"The Vox speak in threats.
We will answer them with action."

lines.name: Replica Siegebreaker

explicitModifiers.text: Your Minions spread Burning Ground on Death, dealing (20-24)% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage per second
Minions have 5% chance to Maim Enemies on Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Recommend extreme caution on any prototypes that can lead to a chain reaction
of deaths. Lab Twelve has been lost to the flames." 
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.name: Bloodbond

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +(12-15)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

lines.name: Saqawal's Flock

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Twister when you gain Avian's Might or Avian's Flight

lines.flavourText:
Though we are individual, we share the same plight.
The First of the Sky teaches us that unity and selflessness,
not division and greed, is what will carry us upwards.

lines.name: The Gluttonous Tide

explicitModifiers.text: Lose all Frenzy Charges on reaching Maximum Frenzy Charges to make the next Bow Attack you perform fire that many additional Arrows
+(30-50)% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have a Frenzy Charge
(20-40)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
To eat, to feast, to forget the horror of endless agonising existence
if but for a moment... only to disgorge and do it all again...

lines.name: Asenath's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow, with a 0.3 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

lines.name: Shiversting

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
Stoic visage, icy heart.
Life of sorrow, lived apart.

lines.name: Vis Mortis

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain (15-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Reap what others have sown
Muster them from their graves
Parade them for your pleasure
Zealots in mortis enslaved

lines.name: Essentia Sanguis

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: +8% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding Claws
Energy Shield Leech Effects from Attacks are not removed at Full Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The darkest clouds clashed and coupled,
giving birth to four lightning children of hate.

lines.name: The Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Glimpse of Eternity when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Shaper Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Shaper Items

lines.flavourText: There can be no defence against the celestial siblings entropy and time.

lines.name: Slivertongue

explicitModifiers.text: (150-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance with arrows that Fork
Arrows Pierce all Targets after Forking
Arrows that Pierce have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier

lines.flavourText: A hundred blind heads, each seeking the taste of prey on the air.

lines.name: The Beast Fur Shawl
lines.flavourText:
The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

lines.name: Actum

explicitModifiers.text: Critical Strike Chance is (20-30)% for Hits with this Weapon

lines.flavourText:
Better to act without thought
than to think without action.

lines.name: Solaris Lorica

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Gain up to maximum Endurance Charges when you take a Critical Strike
Your nearby party members maximum Endurance Charges is equal to yours

lines.flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

lines.name: Atziri's Foible

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText:
The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric. 
We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White. 
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same. 
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

lines.name: Call of the Brotherhood

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (40-48)% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

lines.name: Kaom's Heart
lines.flavourText:
The warrior who
fears will fall.

lines.name: Mjlner

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger a Socketed Lightning Spell on Hit, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Socketed Lightning Spells have no Cost if Triggered

lines.flavourText: Look the storm in the eye and you will have its respect.

lines.name: Perandus Signet

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Intelligence for each Unique Item Equipped
3% chance for Slain monsters to drop an additional Scroll of Wisdom

lines.flavourText:
"Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full.
But our minds are still hungry."
- Medici Perandus, Prefect to the Treasury

lines.name: Prism Guardian

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems Cost and Reserve Life instead of Mana
Socketed Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText: When blood is paid, the weak think twice.

lines.name: The Brass Dome

explicitModifiers.text: Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

lines.name: The Taming

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Freeze, Shock or Ignite on Enemy
10% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Moon after moon did Berek make fools
Of the great and Untamed Three
Until malice for a Brother
Slew the hatred of the Other
And Berek did hunt
Alone and free."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Light of Lunaris

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (35-39) to (54-60) Cold Damage to Spells
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+1% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 1% Chance to Block Attack Damage
+25% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've dealt a Non-Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText: Without night, there can be no day.

lines.name: Abberath's Hooves

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 7 Abberath's Fury when Equipped
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
The Goat King knew not of war,
of the lands and laws he trampled.
The Goat King knew only joy
at turning life to ash.

lines.name: Fenumus' Weave

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Enemies affected by 3 Spider's Webs
Adds (8-10) to (13-15) Chaos Damage for each Spider's Web on the Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A burden shared is a burden made lighter.
The First of the Night teaches us that our burdens 
are not just ours to bear, but ours to use against oppressors.

lines.name: Pillar of the Caged God

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per 20 Intelligence
16% increased Physical Weapon Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Forged to rule the waves and tide
Destined to serve the monkey's paw
Strong as a tower of iron
Deft as the needle doubt

lines.name: Cowl of the Ceraunophile

explicitModifiers.text: Can have a second Enchantment Modifier

lines.flavourText:
The villagers seared the blight with lightning, but it only forked into countless tendrils.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Nebulis

implicitModifiers.text: +(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Cold Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Melee Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Dexterity Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Chaos Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Fire Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Lightning Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Support Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Strength Gems
+(2-6)% to Quality of Socketed Intelligence Gems
Ignites you inflict deal Damage (16-20)% faster
Poisons you inflict deal Damage (15-20)% faster
Adds (3-21) to (7-38) Fire Damage to Spells
+(9-15)% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier
You and nearby Allies deal (7-15)% increased Damage
(4-10)% chance to Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit
(0.1-0.5)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Triggered Spells deal (19-26)% increased Spell Damage
(5-10)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
Adds (3-18) to (5-31) Cold Damage to Spells
(29-45)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
Adds (1-5) to (12-59) Lightning Damage to Spells
(0.2-1.5)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(15-25)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Abyssal Monsters
Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate (2-5)% Elemental Resistances
Gain (4-6)% of Cold Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Adds 1 to (5-6) Lightning Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Intelligence
Adds (1-2) to (3-4) Cold Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Dexterity
Gain (4-6)% of Lightning Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Gain (4-6)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Enemies you Kill have a 15% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Physical Damage
Spells have a (8-10)% chance to deal Double Damage
(5-10)% chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
Bleeding you inflict deals Damage (15-20)% faster
Gain (4-6)% of Fire Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Adds (1-2) to (3-4) Fire Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Strength
(5-10)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill

explicitModifiers.text: (15-20)% increased Cold Damage per 1% Cold Resistance above 75%
(15-20)% increased Lightning Damage per 1% Lightning Resistance above 75%

lines.flavourText:
The vastness of the cosmos holds energies beyond comprehension,
should one have the fortitude to grasp them.

lines.name: Wings of Entropy

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Chaos Damage in Off Hand

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.name: Replica Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-19) to (30-38) Fire Damage to Spells
Adds (10-14) to (24-33) Cold Damage to Spells
Adds 1 to (60-81) Lightning Damage to Spells
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"A legion of forty soldiers attempted to break into Outpost Five and
steal Prototype #659. What do they know that we do not?"

lines.name: Replica Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Better... stronger... more vital... and then... failure. Always, failure.
What key fundamental secret are we missing?"

lines.name: Legacy of Fury

explicitModifiers.text:
(30-40)% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding
Enemy for 4 seconds, dealing 8% of the Killed Enemy's Life as Fire Damage per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was loved, all that was hated -
naught remains but ash.

lines.name: Replica Tulfall

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-29) to (42-47) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Gain a Frenzy Charge on reaching Maximum Power Charges
(15-20)% increased Cold Damage per Frenzy Charge
50% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Hit a Frozen Enemy
Take 500 Cold Damage on reaching Maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
"Are we mad for attempting to build an engine out of this?
Looping cycles, power and pain..." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: Xoph's Nurture

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Ignite Proliferation
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Recover (40-60) Life when you Ignite an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Upon the grey winds his love spreads.

lines.name: Infractem
lines.flavourText:
Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Flame

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Trigger Level 16 Molten Burst on Melee Hit
60% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The Karui savages claim the weapon was forged by their fire god.
I'm rather inclined to believe them."
- Fairgraves, Renowned Explorer

lines.name: The Fracturing Spinner

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-9) to (13-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of Directions Skill
Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.name: The Supreme Truth
lines.flavourText:
Knowledge brings power, and with power you can
grab truth by the throat and shape it as you wish.

lines.name: Replica Last Resort

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
100% increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life
200% increased Damage with Claws while on Low Life
Deal no Damage when not on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"An absurdly vicious weapon in the hands of our test subjects. It seems to
channel the desperate will to live. Intriguing." 
- Researcher Olesya

lines.name: The Harvest

explicitModifiers.text: 1.2% of Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike
3% increased Global Critical Strike Chance per Level
Gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Let it grow and gather inside them,
Let it flow through their veins.
Don't waste a drop.

lines.name: Inpulsa's Broken Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Damage if you have Shocked an Enemy Recently

Shocked Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Life as Lightning Damage which cannot Shock

lines.flavourText:
Don't hesitate; bring death to all, conclusively and swiftly,
or they will give you the same treatment.

lines.name: Replica Volkuur's Guidance

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Skills have 20% chance to Ignite

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #73 is a near perfect opposite of the original. Perhaps our failures
are due to some unknown polarity we have yet to discover."

lines.name: Rigwald's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Today, clansmen, my sword is my voice!"
- Rigwald, at the Battle of Glarryn

lines.name: The Blood Reaper

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
To cease the flow of blood is to 
choke the rain in the very clouds.
Both life and land feel the thirst.

lines.name: The Halcyon

explicitModifiers.text: Freezes you inflict spread to other Enemies within (1.5-15) metres
Freezes you inflict spread to other Enemies within a Radius of 15
60% increased Damage if you've Frozen an Enemy Recently

lines.name: Debeon's Dirge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've used a Warcry Recently
150% increased Elemental Damage if you've used a Warcry Recently
Warcries Knock Back and Interrupt Enemies in a smaller Area

lines.flavourText:
A sharp and heavy beat,
discorded, out of tune,
when you hear it on the wind,
you know death will follow soon.

lines.name: Zerphi's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have 50% increased Attribute Requirements
Chaos Damage can Ignite, Chill and Shock
Gain Soul Eater for 20 seconds when you use a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText: We are incapable of change without sacrifice, for we are both the iron and the forge.

lines.name: The Tempest's Binding

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Innervate
Grants Summon Harbinger of Storms Skill

lines.name: Kongor's Undying Rage

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage
You gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: Command like a king and nothing will stand in your way.

lines.name: Icetomb

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you

lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Temptation Step

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage for each Poison on you up to a maximum of 75%
10% increased Movement Speed for each Poison on you up to a maximum of 50%

Poison you inflict with Travel Skills is Reflected to you if you
have fewer than 5 Poisons on you

lines.flavourText:
The High Priests ensured the loyalty of their slaves by habituating
them to narcotic stimulants with lethal withdrawals.

lines.name: Kondo's Pride

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Melee Damage against Bleeding Enemies
Cannot Leech Life from Critical Strikes
30% chance to Blind Enemies on Critical Strike
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Faintly gleaming in the moonlit night,
Kondo's Pride was primed to fight.
Driven by an inner fire,
bloodlust, spite and ill desire.
He swiftly moved to strike them all,
wreaking havoc like a steel squall.

lines.name: Asenath's Gentle Touch

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit
Non-Aura Curses you inflict are not removed from Dying Enemies

Enemies near corpses affected by your Curses are Blinded
Enemies Killed near corpses affected by your Curses explode, dealing
3% of their Life as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: Cool the head and cool the blade.

lines.name: Atziri's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: You have Vaal Pact if you've dealt a Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText:
"The heart is the herald. 
It will tell me when it is best to strike."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Atziri's Step
lines.flavourText:
"Those who dance are considered insane 
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Bitterdream

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Bonechill
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Hypothermia
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Cold Penetration
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Added Cold Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Inspiration

lines.flavourText:
Fight not the cold
Forsake hope
Be still.

lines.name: Chitus' Apex
lines.flavourText:
"It takes true strength to hold power,
and my grip grows tighter by the day."
 - Emperor Chitus

lines.name: Cospri's Malice

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Cold Spell on Melee Critical Strike, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Adds (40-60) to (90-110) Cold Damage to Spells
60% increased Critical Strike Chance against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Breathe deep, my child.
Let the frigid air engulf your soul.
Embrace the eternal cold, 
And it will embrace you back.

lines.name: Death Rush

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Adrenaline for 1 second on kill
Gain Adrenaline for (2-3) seconds on kill

lines.flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

lines.name: Doryani's Invitation

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life
0.6% of Physical Damage Leeched as Life
0.6% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
0.6% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
(20-29)% chance to Freeze during any Flask Effect
(20-30)% chance to Shock during any Flask Effect
25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold during any Flask Effect
(20-30)% chance to Ignite during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"You can invite them but you can never be 
sure who will come knocking."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Meginord's Vise

explicitModifiers.text: Melee Strike Skills deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Melee Hits with Strike Skills always Knockback

lines.flavourText:
Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

lines.name: Shavronne's Wrappings

explicitModifiers.text: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

lines.name: The Gull

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy
75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you

lines.flavourText:
"It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor.
The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our
souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life.
The Gull gives us our Way."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Pariah

explicitModifiers.text: +(100-102) to Maximum Life per Red Socket
+(100-102) to Maximum Mana per Green Socket
+100 to Maximum Energy Shield per Blue Socket
15% increased Item Quantity per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
A man who changes his loyalties often,
soon finds he has none.

lines.name: Ventor's Gamble
lines.flavourText:
In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

lines.name: Windscream

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse
50% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills

lines.flavourText:
The mocking wind, a shielding spell,
The haunting screams, a maddening hell.

lines.name: Xoph's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies are Covered in Ash

lines.name: Voll's Vision

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% increased Maximum Life if no Equipped Items are Corrupted
Regenerate 400 Life per second if no Equipped Items are Corrupted

lines.flavourText: Righteous men seek virtue like tame pups seek praise.

lines.name: Shade of Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
200% increased Spell Damage if you've dealt a Critical Strike in the past 8 seconds

lines.flavourText: Without light, there can be no shadow.

lines.name: Severed in Sleep

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 60% chance to inflict Withered on Hit
Minions have +5% to Critical Strike Multiplier per Withered Debuff on Enemy

lines.name: Dying Breath

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 18% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
18% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
Nearby Enemies have 18% increased Effect of Curses on them
18% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
The whispers of the dead
Carry wisdom for the living,
If you are willing to give your life
To listen.

lines.name: The Rippling Thoughts

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of the Arcane Skill
Trigger Level 20 Storm Cascade when you Attack
Adds 1 to (60-70) Lightning Damage to Spells

lines.name: The Enmity Divine

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 1 Chance to Bleed
Grants Summon Harbinger of Brutality Skill
+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
