lines.name: Yoke of Suffering

explicitModifiers.text: 30% reduced Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Enemies take 5% increased Damage for each type of Ailment you have inflicted on them

lines.flavourText: Let the unrepentant be dragged ever downwards by the weight of their sins.

lines.name: Darkness Enthroned

explicitModifiers.text: (50-100)% increased Effect of Socketed Abyss Jewels

lines.flavourText:
Hold in your hand the darkness
and never will the light blind you.

lines.name: Beltimber Blade

explicitModifiers.text: Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles if you've used a Movement Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
By wind and wing they are carried,
Their fates not theirs to control,
Yet the fates of others dragged in their wake.

lines.name: Arborix

explicitModifiers.text: Bow Attacks fire 2 additional Arrows if you haven't Cast Dash recently
(20-30)% increased Attack Speed if you haven't Cast Dash recently
(100-160)% increased Evasion Rating if you've Cast Dash recently
(20-30)% increased Movement Speed if you've Cast Dash recently
Travel Skills other than Dash are Disabled

lines.flavourText:
Through droughts, fires, floods and frost,
the ancient giants stand resolute,
while deep in the rich, dark earth,
their grasp stretches ever farther.

lines.name: Mark of the Shaper

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Trigger Level 20 Summon Volatile Anomaly on Kill
Adds (13-21) to (50-67) Lightning Damage to Spells
(60-96)% increased Spell Damage if your other Ring is an Elder Item
Cannot be Stunned by Spells if your other Ring is a Shaper Item

lines.flavourText: Let madness take control.

lines.name: Saqawal's Talons

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Avian Skill
Regenerate 100 Life per Second while you have Avian's Flight
Regenerate 12 Mana per Second while you have Avian's Flight

lines.flavourText:
A bird, too heavily laden, cannot take flight.
The First of the Sky teaches us to put aside our possessions
so that we may live more freely.

lines.name: Craiceann's Carapace

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

lines.name: Craiceann's Pincers

explicitModifiers.text:
10% chance that if you would gain a Crab Barrier, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The stone that stays in the waves soon crumbles to sand.
The First of the Deep teaches us to watch the tides
and choose our moments to move wisely.

lines.name: Fenumus' Spinnerets

explicitModifiers.text: Aspect of the Spider can inflict Spider's Web on Enemies an additional time
Gain (15-20) Energy Shield for each Enemy you Hit which is affected by a Spider's Web
(40-50)% increased Aspect of the Spider Debuff Duration

lines.flavourText:
When the fires spilled out of the mountain, The First of the Night wove a net
and was carried into the night on its hot winds.
Though we cannot live without danger, we can learn to live with it.

lines.name: Farrul's Bite

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Cat Skill
+1% to Critical Strike Chance while affected by Aspect of the Cat
Critical Strikes have (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies while you have Cat's Stealth
(40-50)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
It is a fool who strikes the turtle's shell.
The First of the Plains teaches us to exploit weaknesses,
and where no weakness can be found, to create one.

lines.name: Unyielding Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Commandment of Inferno on Critical Strike
(8-12)% increased Attack Speed if you've dealt a Critical Strike Recently
(8-12)% increased Cast Speed if you've dealt a Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText:
An Emperor must conquer his own darkness
before he can act as a beacon of light.

lines.name: Doryani's Delusion

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 25 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (1-3) to (68-72) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Every day we choose safety or knowledge. 
Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal
than help it tread water." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Doryani's Delusion

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (1-3) to (68-72) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Every day we choose safety or knowledge. 
Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal
than help it tread water." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Doryani's Delusion

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill

When I closed my eyes, I saw only death.
Each breath tainted with the scent of seared and smouldering flesh,
And each sound tangled with pleas for mercy."

explicitModifiers.text: Critical Strikes inflict Malignant Madness if The Eater of Worlds is dominant
Kill Enemies that have 15% or lower Life on Hit if The Searing Exarch is dominant

lines.flavourText: Simply the way it must be, so that existence may be.

lines.name: Leadership's Price

explicitModifiers.text: You have Scorching Conflux, Brittle Conflux and Sapping Conflux while your two highest Attributes are equal
Cannot Ignite, Chill, Freeze or Shock

lines.flavourText:
"Remain poised. Remain balanced. Keep all the emotions of a lifetime caged.
Let only your enemies see the truth of your rage."

lines.name: Widowhail

explicitModifiers.text: (150-250)% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver

lines.flavourText:
"I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

lines.name: The Fourth Vow

explicitModifiers.text: Physical Damage taken bypasses Energy Shield
Armour also applies to Chaos Damage taken from Hits

lines.flavourText:
Seek not to avoid the mortal pains of this world.
In flagellation, there lies freedom from temptation.

lines.name: The Formless Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Armour is increased by Overcapped Fire Resistance

lines.name: Xoph's Inception

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (205-300) Life per Ignited Enemy Killed
Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Arrows deal 30 to 50 Added Fire Damage for each time they've Pierced

lines.flavourText:
Upon the red pyre we are born.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph}

lines.name: The First Crest

explicitModifiers.text: Aureus Coins are converted to Relics upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge
Aureus Coins are converted to Experience upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge
Aureus Coins are converted to Tainted Currency upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge
This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

lines.flavourText: "In pursuit of divinity, he tried many times to found a religion. Few followed his initial symbols and proverbs. He needed something greater. A symbol none could deny." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.name: The Snowblind Grace
Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects 30 Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
100% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: Replica Allure

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: Gain +50 Life when you Taunt an Enemy
You gain Onslaught for 1 seconds on Killing Taunted Enemies
Enemies Taunted by you take 10% increased Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject was able to survive the entire process simply by shouting epithets at
the researcher. Researcher's feelings were slightly injured." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Ahkeli's Mountain
Chin Sol

explicitModifiers.text: 50% more Damage with Arrow Hits at Close Range

lines.flavourText:
As a soldier you want to get close to enemy archers.
That is not the case when fighting the Maraketh.

lines.name: Hiltless

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Lifetap
Enemies you Attack Reflect 100 Physical Damage to you

lines.flavourText:
The cuts on my hands are a small price to pay
for the opportunity to drive my steel
beyond the flesh and into the demon's soul.

lines.name: Replica Ungil's Gauche

explicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Chill Attackers for 4 seconds on Block
Shock Attackers for 4 seconds on Block

lines.flavourText:
"Recommend further production of Prototype #122. It makes
an ideal weapon for our suppression troops and guards."

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Darkscorn

explicitModifiers.text: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
20% chance for Poisons inflicted with this Weapon to deal 300% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The Spirit of War knows nothing of good and evil.
It knows only destruction."
- Sekhema Asenath

lines.name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: 35% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
100% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

lines.name: Shavronne's Revelation

explicitModifiers.text: Right ring slot: You cannot Regenerate Mana
Right ring slot: Regenerate (6-7.2)% of Energy Shield per second
Right ring slot: +(250-300) to maximum Mana
Left ring slot: You cannot Recharge or Regenerate Energy Shield
Left ring slot: Regenerate (40-48) Mana per Second
Left ring slot: +(250-300) to maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
"Shavronne held Sanity in her right
hand and Revelation in her left.
Brutus chose the left hand."
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: Kitava's Feast

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 30 Melee Splash
1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

lines.flavourText:
Hinekora bound Kitava to a rock 
that Kitava could not lift with all his might.
Kitava vowed that when he broke free, 
he would devour every soul in Hinekora's domain.

lines.name: Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama couldn't lose a fight in his fortress,
So he carried his fortress to the fight.

lines.name: Winterweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-18) to (25-36) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (12-18) to (25-36) Cold Damage to Attacks
The Effect of Chill on you is reversed

lines.flavourText: Fury fuels defiance.

lines.name: Omeyocan

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Evasion Rating per 500 Maximum Mana, up to 100%
You have Onslaught while not on Low Mana

lines.flavourText:
Only a fool seeks meaning
in a life so fleeting.

lines.name: Replica Midnight Bargain

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be used with Chaos Inoculation
+6 to maximum number of Raging Spirits
+3 to maximum number of Summoned Phantasms

lines.flavourText:
"Simply incredible. I caught an escaping test subject myself with
swarms of burning skulls. Delightful!" 
- Researcher Olesya

lines.name: Replica Oro's Sacrifice

implicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage against Frozen Enemies Leeched as Life
Gain an Endurance Charge if an Attack Freezes an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"Ice and flame antagonized in the essence of a prototype.
What once burned now chills the soul." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Wings of Entropy

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Chaos Damage in Off Hand

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.name: Nuro's Harp

explicitModifiers.text: 15% chance to create Chilled Ground when you Freeze an Enemy
Create Consecrated Ground when you Shatter an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Night's frost becomes morning's dew
Darkness cleansed, pure and new.

lines.name: Replica Infractem

explicitModifiers.text: Projectiles from Attacks Fork an additional time

lines.flavourText:
"How did you manage to lodge arrows in every single test subject
and researcher in Lab Three simultaneously... again?" 
- Doctor Bircus

lines.name: Infernal Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
100% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana

lines.flavourText:
Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies. 
Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

lines.name: Thunderfist

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Added Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
The roar of the heavens
Strikes more than fear
Into the hearts of Man

lines.name: Winds of Change

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to Knock Enemies Back on hit

lines.name: Fenumus' Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies affected by your Spider's Webs deal 10% reduced Damage
Enemies affected by your Spider's Webs have -10% to All Resistances
(50-70)% increased Aspect of the Spider Area of Effect

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Night was the first explorer
It was she who first braved night's terrors
and found comfort in silence and solace.

lines.name: Fenumus' Toxins

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (16-21) to (31-36) Chaos Damage to Spells
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on hitting an Enemy affected by a Spider's Web
(6-10)% chance to Poison per Power Charge
(15-20)% increased Damage with Poison per Power Charge
Aspect of the Spider inflicts Spider's Webs and Hinder every 0.5 Seconds instead

lines.flavourText:
A hunter uses everything at their disposal.
The First of the Night did not hold back her venom. 
She used it to weaken her enemies, 
and used her enemies to strengthen her many children.

lines.name: Hyperboreus

explicitModifiers.text: Chill nearby Enemies when you Focus, causing 30% reduced Action Speed
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Your Critical Strike Chance is Lucky while Focused
Focus has (30-58)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
(50-70)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText: Cold winds whirl at the crown of the world.

lines.name: Machina Mitts

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage dealt by your Mines is Leeched to you as Life
(20-30)% reduced Recovery rate of Life and Energy Shield
5% increased Recovery rate of Life and Energy Shield per Power Charge
Lose a Power Charge each second if you have not Detonated Mines Recently

lines.flavourText:
Biology is but a machine, begetting effusion of energies;
death is but a curse, that can be given... or reversed.

lines.name: Replica Tempestuous Steel

explicitModifiers.text: +(60-100)% to Critical Strike Multiplier with One Handed Melee Weapons
Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate 30% Elemental Resistances
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Test subjects were unable to strike even a motionless target.
However, when a trained guard tried it..."

lines.name: Replica Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
Gain an Endurance Charge when you are Hit
Lose 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #7 achieved even greater injury responsiveness than expected,
though at considerable cost to the long-term survival rate of the user."

lines.name: Story of the Vaal

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage from Hits with this Weapon is Converted to a random Element
Hits with this Weapon always Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Hits with this Weapon Freeze Enemies as though dealing (150-200)% more Damage
Hits with this Weapon Shock Enemies as though dealing (150-200)% more Damage
Ignites inflicted with this Weapon deal (50-75)% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
Through war we found peace. Through death we found advancement.
Our ancestors did not know where their actions would take them.
Are we any better?

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Fate}

lines.name: Replica Soul Strike

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Critical Strike Chance with Bows

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (13-18) to (26-32) Physical Damage to Attacks
80% reduced Maximum Recovery per Life Leech
40% increased Maximum total Life Recovery per second from Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The theft of another's vitality is short-lived, but sweet.
It calls to me, bidding me abandon all other pursuits."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
50% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Rainbowstride
lines.flavourText:
"They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

lines.name: Soulwrest

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Summon Phantasm Skill when you Consume a corpse
Minions deal (45-51) to (66-78) additional Physical Damage
If you Consumed a corpse Recently, you and nearby Allies Regenerate 5% of Life per second

lines.flavourText: Death is but the start of your servitude.

lines.name: Replica Harvest

explicitModifiers.text: 1.2% of Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike
3% increased Global Critical Strike Chance per Level

lines.flavourText:
"Why is Prototype #67 never in the vault it should be?
Either we're keeping faulty logs, or..." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Reach of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Greater Volley
Arrows fired from the first firing points always Pierce
Arrows fired from the second firing points Fork
Arrows fired from the third firing points Return to you
Arrows fired from the fourth firing points Chain +2 times

lines.flavourText: We stand together. We strike together.

lines.name: Replica Fencoil

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Multiple Totems

lines.flavourText:
"Attempt #306: The power I can sense in this ancient branch
still eludes me. Perhaps if I attach some string and a hook..."

lines.name: Cadigan's Crown
lines.flavourText:
Cadigan the Third ruled dispassionately
through the iron might of artifice.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

explicitModifiers.text: (276-335)% increased Armour, Evasion and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Doryani's Catalyst

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Elemental Proliferation
0.2% of Elemental Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
The result of the catalytic reaction would be either immortality for all,
or death for all. It was a risk Doryani was willing to take.

lines.name: Jorrhast's Blacksteel

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 20 Animate Weapon on Kill
Weapons you Animate create an additional copy

lines.flavourText:
His flesh had long turned to dust,
but his vengeance lived on
in every scrap of iron he touched.

lines.name: Replica Earendel's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Raised Zombies Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit
Raised Zombies take (15-30)% of their Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
Raised Zombies have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
"Lord of Bone, Lord of Flesh, yet all that we can
master turns to ash." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Abyssus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 40 to 60 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When you have slain all of your enemies,
what is left to fear?

lines.name: Alpha's Howl

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
16% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

lines.flavourText:
Nature respects the strong
And paints the snow red
With the blood of the weak

lines.name: Berek's Respite

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-30) to (30-60) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"With Flame licking at his heels
Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Carcass Jack
lines.flavourText:
"...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance
lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Crown of Eyes

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-0.8)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(0.2-0.4)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Increases and Reductions to Spell Damage also apply to Attacks at 150% of their value

lines.flavourText:
Turning, gazing, blinking,
behold the eyes of void.
Burning, razing, drinking,
your mind is destroyed.

lines.name: Death's Harp
lines.flavourText:
The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

lines.name: Death's Oath

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Death Aura when Equipped
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You take 450 Chaos Damage per second for 3 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Tears of blood, aching heart,
My dear Isildria must depart.

lines.name: Doryani's Fist

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (150-225) to (525-600) Lightning Damage to Unarmed Melee Hits
Adds (90-135) to (315-360) Lightning Damage to Spells while Unarmed
+(200-250) Energy Shield gained on Killing a Shocked Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Doryani's ingenuity raised the Vaal Empire
to unprecedented heights. His curiosity
reduced it to ruins and bones.

lines.name: Ephemeral Edge

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon have Added Maximum Lightning Damage equal to 20% of your Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
In the rift between future and past,
life passes quickly.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: Le Heup of All

lines.flavourText: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 22 Blasphemy
Socketed Curse Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText:
Branded a heretic for your beliefs,
You stand alone against many.
May the truth that fuels their anger,
Carry your blade into their hearts.

lines.name: Leer Cast

explicitModifiers.text: You and nearby allies gain 50% increased Damage

lines.flavourText: For none of us are as cruel as all of us.

lines.name: Malachai's Loop

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
(12-16)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Thaumaturgy has no limit.
It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

lines.name: Rigwald's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Summon Spectral Wolf on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Within the heart of every man and woman
lies the soul of a ferocious beast.
If you cannot tame it, embrace it.

lines.name: Saffell's Frame
lines.flavourText: A swift mind solves problems before they occur.

lines.name: Scold's Bridle

explicitModifiers.text: Your Skills deal you 400% of Mana Spent on Upfront Skill Mana Costs as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The sharper the pain, the sharper the mind. 
A curious paradox."	
- Shavronne of Umbra

lines.name: Shaper's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

lines.name: Skyforth

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Stun Threshold is based on 500% of your Mana instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
The quick die young, the brilliant go mad,
and the powerful stand alone in a wasteland of their own creation.

lines.name: The Ascetic

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Rarity of Items found with a Normal Item Equipped
(10-15)% increased Quantity of Items found with a Magic Item Equipped

lines.flavourText: Many things come to one who has nothing.

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to (4-12) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Voidwalker

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Avoid Projectiles while Phasing
You have Phasing if you've Killed Recently
Projectiles Pierce 5 additional Targets while you have Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Step into the void
and experience true freedom.

lines.name: Voll's Devotion

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge when you lose a Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"We are the soldiers of Faith, armoured in devotion.
Let the sinners come, for we - the Pure - shall endure!"
- Voll of Thebrus, at the Battle of the Bridge

lines.name: Lycosidae

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 250 to 300 Cold Damage to Counterattacks

lines.flavourText: A true predator does not chase; It waits.

lines.name: Haemophilia

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have 25% chance to cause Bleeding
(25-40)% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies

Bleeding Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Maximum Life as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
"A master artist takes his time when he's painting.
Unfortunately, my kind doesn't often have that luxury."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Gloomfang

explicitModifiers.text: 0.5% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
Lose (10-15) Life per Enemy Hit with Spells
Lose (20-25) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Projectiles that have Chained gain (20-42)% of Non-Chaos Damage as extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText: Darkness never stops feeding.

lines.name: Nebuloch

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage
+4% to Chaos Resistance per Endurance Charge
1% reduced Elemental Damage taken from Hits per Endurance Charge
Adds 5 to 8 Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
200 Fire Damage taken per second per Endurance Charge if you've been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
They hoped that, trapped in its prison,
the creature would age and perish.
But time would not touch the fiend.

lines.name: Grelwood Shank

explicitModifiers.text: Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles if you've been Hit Recently

lines.name: Mark of Submission

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit

lines.flavourText:
So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

lines.name: Command of the Pit

explicitModifiers.text: With a Ghastly Eye Jewel Socketed, Minions have +1000 to Accuracy Rating
With a Hypnotic Eye Jewel Socketed, gain Arcane Surge on Hit with Spells

lines.flavourText: We serve only the Night.

lines.name: Mistwall

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-15)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits while Phasing
You are at Maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have not Blocked Recently
You have Phasing if you have Blocked Recently

lines.flavourText:
Light as a board,
Stiff as a feather.

lines.name: The Front Line
lines.flavourText:
It was a great honour to fight at the front. 
The few that survived the initial charge were guaranteed fame and fortune.

lines.name: Kitava's Teachings
lines.flavourText:
Savour the bitter, cherish the sweet,
For there may never be another chance to eat.

lines.name: Replica Voideye
lines.flavourText: "So close, yet frustratingly distinct. Something more is going on here..."

lines.name: Rotblood Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy
Curse Auras from Socketed Skills also affect you
Socketed Curse Gems have 80% increased Reservation Efficiency
20% reduced Effect of Curses on you
(15-25)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Accept the infection, let it take hold.
Then carry it far and wide.

lines.name: Olroth's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Adrenaline for 3 seconds when Ward Breaks

lines.flavourText:
Where others would retreat when vulnerable,
Olroth the Gallant fought deeper into battle.

lines.name: Wilma's Requital

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed apply to Attack Speed

lines.flavourText:
Bold and beautiful, a castaway
Hemmed and hawed, for her to stay
Oh, what I'd give for one more day
For she's the one that got away
-Franklin

lines.name: Esh's Mirror

explicitModifiers.text: Shocks you inflict spread to other Enemies within 1.5 metres
Shocks you inflict spread to other Enemies within a Radius of 15
Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage for each Shocked Enemy you've Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
She looked upon her reflection
and trembled, and shook,
until she was not what she saw.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Esh}

lines.name: Tawhanuku's Timing

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

Spells cause you to gain Energy Shield equal to their Upfront
Cost every fifth time you Pay it

lines.flavourText: The soul still beats, even when the heart never did.

lines.name: The Night Lamp

explicitModifiers.text: The Herald of the Scourge drops an additional Forbidden Tome
No Resolve Mitigation, chance to Avoid Resolve loss or Resolve Aegis
This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

lines.flavourText: "The newcomers were terrified of fire. He used their fear to control them, to lay the seeds of unquestioning faith. He claimed only his god could protect them." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.name: Bisco's Collar

explicitModifiers.text: (100-150)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Magic Enemies
(35-50)% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain Normal Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Friendship worth its weight in gold,
a treasure every day.
I thought together we'd grow old,
until fate pulled you away.

lines.name: Steelworm

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks that Fire Projectiles Consume up to 1 additional Steel Shard

Skills Fire 3 additional Projectiles for 4 seconds after
you consume a total of 12 Steel Shards

lines.flavourText: The dance of metal and flesh never ends.

lines.name: Survivor's Guilt
lines.flavourText:
The burden falls heaviest not on those that died,
but on those that did not.

lines.name: Axiom Perpetuum

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Fire Damage to Spells
Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Cold Damage to Spells
Adds 1 to (10-12) Lightning Damage to Spells
(100-140)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

lines.flavourText: The worst of Axiom were imprisoned by more than iron.

lines.name: Black Sun Crest
lines.flavourText:
The beasts we fear the most
are the ones who dwell in total darkness.

lines.name: Blackheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (10-18) to (20-30) Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText: Fear is highly infectious.

lines.name: Brutus' Lead Sprinkler

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 7 Fire Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"A sprinkle of liquid encouragement is often required 
to garnish the perfect confession." 
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Daresso's Courage

explicitModifiers.text: +30% Chance to Block Spell Damage while on Low Life
+100% Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have Blocked Spell Damage Recently
+100% chance to Block Spell Damage if you have Blocked Attack Damage Recently

lines.flavourText:
By tourney's end, Daresso bled and shivered.
Yet even accursed treachery failed to steal the champion's victory.

lines.name: Doomfletch

implicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element

lines.flavourText:
"Toasted or frozen
Or twitching in the light
I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch

lines.name: Eye of Chayula
lines.flavourText:
Never blinking, always watching.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula}

lines.name: Goldwyrm
lines.flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

lines.name: Greed's Embrace
lines.flavourText:
Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

lines.name: Heartbound Loop

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
(350-420) Physical Damage taken on Minion Death

lines.flavourText:
When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

lines.name: Heartbreaker

explicitModifiers.text: (40-80)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge

lines.flavourText:
A heart can be stabbed by thoughts, 
If your mind is sharp enough.

lines.name: Hinekora's Sight
lines.flavourText: Remember the past, anticipate the future.

lines.name: Hrimsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects 100 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

lines.name: Hyrri's Bite

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (6-8) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Cold Damage to Attacks
Gain (2-3) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
A Karui woman's place was not the 
battlefield, but the hearth.
Hyrri changed all of that.

lines.name: Immortal Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: -(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
(40-41)% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked

lines.flavourText:
"She begged the Earth to spare her Son;
Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Kaom's Roots

explicitModifiers.text: Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value

lines.flavourText: Don't flinch. It's a waste of good hitting time.

lines.name: Karui Ward
lines.flavourText:
"Shoot first, ask no questions."
- Karui wisdom

lines.name: Lifesprig

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Spell Gems
Regenerate (6-8) Life over 1 second when you Cast a Spell

lines.flavourText:
From the smallest seeds
To the tallest redwoods,
Life endures in Wraeclast.

lines.name: Lioneye's Remorse

explicitModifiers.text: -25 Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Marceus' unblemished shield is a testament
to his arrogance... and his fate.

lines.name: Lochtonial Caress

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

lines.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
lines.flavourText:
Maligaro operated effortlessly,
with great speed and terrible consequences.

lines.name: Pyre

explicitModifiers.text: (40-48)% of Cold Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Ignited Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

lines.flavourText: Let winter come. It will only make my fire burn brighter.

lines.name: Quecholli

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Killed with Attack or Spell Hits Explode, dealing 10% of their Life as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The finest prosperity grows from the direst
carnage. Such is the nature of progress."
- Doryani of the Vaal

lines.name: Quill Rain
lines.flavourText:
"The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."
- Rigwald of the Ezomytes

lines.name: Rebuke of the Vaal
lines.flavourText:
Though the Vaal revered peace, it would have 
been suicide for any culture to rouse them to war.
- Icius Perandus, Scholar to the Empire.

lines.name: Redblade Band

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have 25% chance to Taunt on Hit
Socketed Golem Skills have Minions Regenerate 5% of Life per second
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems

lines.flavourText:
To ascend to leadership, the child of a Redblade warlord
must pull the band from the still-hot
ashes of their father.

lines.name: Redblade Tramplers

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (2-5) to (7-10) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Our home was swallowed beneath 
the great mountain for our complacency. 
Now we must prove our value to the Molten One 
by sating his hunger for life.

lines.name: Southbound

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (60-72) to (88-100) Cold Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

lines.name: The Retch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
30% reduced Flask Charges gained during any Flask Effect
(200-240)% of Life Leech applies to Enemies as Chaos Damage
(15-18)% increased Movement Speed during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
But the grain grew twisted and the water turned dark
and those who partook of Mother Gull's gift
birthed monsters that fed 
on the flesh of one another.

lines.name: The Scourge

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Minion Damage also affect you at 150% of their value
Minions deal 70% increased Damage if you've Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
With increasing mastery over death
comes an increasing desire for it.

lines.name: The Whispering Ice

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Support Gems

lines.flavourText:
Guard your darkest thoughts well, for they are
the cracks through which the Nightmare crawls.

lines.name: Trypanon

explicitModifiers.text: This Weapon's Critical Strike Chance is 100%

lines.flavourText:
"Though ingenious instruments have been found,
it seems surgery before thaumaturgy
was not so delicate."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3546

lines.name: Wanderlust
lines.flavourText: All the world is my home.

lines.name: Volkuur's Guidance

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-3) to (42-47) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (16-20) to (25-30) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (16-20) to (25-30) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Lightning Skills have 20% chance to Poison on Hit
Cold Skills have 20% chance to Poison on Hit
Fire Skills have 20% chance to Poison on Hit

lines.flavourText:
You do not cease to be when you die
any more than the caterpillar ceases to be when it cocoons.
Come, let me show you.

lines.name: Yriel's Fostering

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Snake Skill
Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Rhoa Skill
Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Ursa Skill
Projectile Attack Skills have (40-60)% increased Critical Strike Chance

Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to inflict Bleeding on Hit while

(10-15)% increased Attack and Movement Speed while you have a Bestial Minion
Adds (11-16) to (21-25) Physical Damage to Attacks while you have a Bestial Minion

lines.flavourText:
Feed a beast and it will not hunt.
Protect it and it will not fight.
Ferocity must be learned, not taught.
It is suffering that forges the greatest warriors.

lines.name: Invictus Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Fire Aegis when Equipped

lines.flavourText:
Eternal soldiers fight for glory or death.
The Solaris Vanguard know only glory.

lines.name: Vix Lunaris

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Cold Aegis when Equipped

lines.flavourText:
Silent, silent night,
Quench the holy light.

lines.name: Memory Vault
lines.flavourText:
Your memories are a bridge to the past.
Let no one cross.

lines.name: Blasphemer's Grasp

explicitModifiers.text: +6 to Maximum Life per Elder Item Equipped
+4% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
8% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
Remove an Ailment when you use a Flask if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
Reaching nature's limits, 
many sought power in the unnatural.

lines.flavourText: Be careful where you put your finger.

lines.name: Cyclopean Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Frozen if Dexterity is higher than Intelligence
Cannot be Ignited if Strength is higher than Dexterity
Cannot be Shocked if Intelligence is higher than Strength
1% increased Damage per 5 of your lowest Attribute

lines.flavourText:
With the patience of a prowling lion,
the Shade watched the Scholar.

lines.name: Tombfist

explicitModifiers.text: With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Attacks have 25% chance to grant Onslaught On Kill
With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Melee Hits have 25% chance to Fortify

With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Blind Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Ever watched a man crush another man's skull?
Hard to feel hope after that."

lines.name: Doedre's Skin

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy

Grants Level 20 Summon Doedre's Effigy Skill
Socketed Hex Curse Skills are Triggered by Doedre's Effigy when Summoned
Hexes from Socketed Skills can apply 5 additional Curses

lines.flavourText:
As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

lines.name: Vulconus

explicitModifiers.text: 50% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
(70-100)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Bleeding Enemies
(70-100)% increased Physical Damage with Hits and Ailments against Ignited Enemies
Every 8 seconds, gain Avatar of Fire for 4 seconds
(160-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance while you have Avatar of Fire
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire while you have Avatar of Fire
+2000 Armour while you do not have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
Lava bled from the earth and,
after a time, cooled and hardened.
The world protecting its beating heart 
with a thick, black scab.

lines.name: Chains of Command

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Guardian Kills an Enemy
10% chance to Trigger Level 18 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Weapon Kills an Enemy
Animated Guardian deals 5% increased Damage per Animated Weapon
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal 50% less Damage to surrounding targets

lines.flavourText:
A general may carry his men to greatness, 
or be dragged beneath the mire by their burden.

lines.name: The Grey Spire

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText:
There was never a simpler time.
Just simpler motivations.

lines.name: Cerberus Limb

explicitModifiers.text: 0.5% of Spell Damage Leeched as Life if Equipped Shield has at least 30% Chance to Block
+1 to Maximum Energy Shield per 5 Armour on Equipped Shield
+5 to Armour per 5 Evasion Rating on Equipped Shield
+20 to Evasion Rating per 5 Maximum Energy Shield on Equipped Shield

lines.flavourText: The greatest of guardians make the greatest of sacrifices.

lines.name: Hale Negator

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Gain a Spirit Charge every second
You lose all Spirit Charges when taking a Savage Hit
Recover (2-3)% of Life when you lose a Spirit Charge
Recover (2-3)% of Energy Shield when you lose a Spirit Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Feel the pain of ancient wounds.
Feel the doom of dying souls."

lines.name: Flamesight
lines.flavourText: See creation as it was, aflame and frantic.

lines.name: Hyrri's Truth

lines.flavourText: Strike true, strike hard, and leave no survivors to retaliate.

lines.flavourText: A moment of calm before the battle can end the war.

Speed if 25% of Curse Duration expired

lines.flavourText: Death creeps closer; unseen, inexorable, hungry.

lines.flavourText: Simple. Deadly. Unstoppable.

lines.flavourText:
Primordial rage slumbers, waiting for the call
of the stars to return and swallow the world.

lines.name: Nightgrip

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Added Chaos Damage equal to 20% of Ward

lines.flavourText:
Those heroes that set foot on Wraeclast found
themselves changing, only subtly at first...

lines.name: Medved's Challenge

explicitModifiers.text: 80% less Flask Charges gained from Kills
Flasks gain 1 Charge per second if you've Hit a Unique Enemy Recently

lines.flavourText:
For forty-two nights, the Feller of Heroes challenged
the next greatest warrior to a one-on-one duel.
None could match his might.

lines.name: Hand of Thought and Motion

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Dexterity
5% increased Critical Strike Chance per 25 Intelligence

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (200-300) Life per Ignited Enemy Killed
Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Arrows deal 30 to 50 Added Fire Damage for each time they've Pierced

lines.flavourText:
Upon the red pyre we are born.

lines.name: Tulborn

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-29) to (42-47) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

Cold Exposure you inflict applies an extra -12% to Cold Resistance

lines.flavourText:
We remember the stillness.
Then the great fall.
The pain of separation.
We return once more.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Tul}

lines.name: Kiloava's Bluster

explicitModifiers.text: (30-40)% chance for Elemental Resistances to count as being 90% against Enemy Hits

lines.flavourText: Not even the storm knows when lightning will strike.

explicitModifiers.text: Take no Burning Damage if you've stopped taking Burning Damage Recently

lines.flavourText:
For centuries, he burned in an unending
nightmare of lava and flame... but he endured.

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (30-40) to (60-70) Cold Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: The last Queen of the Karui gave up power willingly.

lines.name: The Chains of Castigation

explicitModifiers.text: The Herald of the Scourge drops Sandstorm Visage
Rooms are unknown on the Sanctum Map
Cannot be used with Forbidden Tomes below level 75
This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

lines.flavourText: "The mysterious traveller saw the vilified brother chained to a cliff, where all could point and shout and deride him. In one fell swing, she cracked the mountainside, freeing him." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.name: Contract: Heart of Glory
lines.flavourText:
"A part of me still believes I can convince Nashta to give up her rebellious ways and come home. That part
of me will forever be nine years of age, futilely chasing her as she runs off into the dunes yet again."

lines.name: The Broken Censer

explicitModifiers.text: The Herald of the Scourge drops 2 additional Forbidden Tomes
Rooms are unknown on the Sanctum Map
Cannot be used with Forbidden Tomes below level 75
This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

lines.flavourText: "His followers were too small in number to spark divinity, so he turned to a greater power: hatred. He vilified his brother, sparking zealotry, and the change finally began." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.name: Doon Cuebiyari

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Iron Will
1% increased Damage per 8 Strength when in Main Hand
1% increased Armour per 16 Strength when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
My Iron heart will beat when yours is rust. 
I take your Strength, your power, your lust. 
By Iron Will alone I set my mind in motion.
Through endless storms of fervent devotion.

You have Unholy Might while you have no Energy Shield
Create Profane Ground instead of Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: Be not blinded by the light.

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Aurseize
lines.flavourText: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

lines.name: Berek's Grip

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (50-82) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies
1% of Damage Leeched as Energy Shield against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
"Berek hid from Storm's lightning wrath
In the embrace of oblivious Frost
Repelled by ice, blinded by blizzards
Storm raged in vain
While Berek slept."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Berek's Pass

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (30-50) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"From Frost's ice-bound pass
Berek taunted and jeered
Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Brain Rattler

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Enemies you Shock have 30% reduced Cast Speed
Enemies you Shock have 20% reduced Movement Speed
Hits with this Weapon Shock Enemies as though dealing 300% more Damage

lines.flavourText: The mind may have no limits, but the skull sure does.

lines.name: Cospri's Will

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse
Your Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
Always Poison on Hit against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Curse their vile Council,
They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.
If they only knew the power I possess.

lines.name: Daresso's Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit
100% increased Effect of Onslaught on you

lines.flavourText:
"When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: Darkray Vectors

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Evasion Rating per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Sirrius flew on wings of light, faster than wind, faster
than thought. But try as he might to outrun the darkness,
it was there, at every turn, waiting for him."
- Azmerian legend

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion
lines.flavourText:
Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

lines.name: Dreamfeather

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Attack Damage per 450 Evasion Rating

lines.flavourText:
She dances a dance beneath the shade,
The twilight shroud her only blade,
Who now hears her feathersteps flowing?
Beneath the stars, the moondrops glowing.

lines.name: Grip of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Death does not remove you from our grasp.
Death only brings you closer.

lines.name: Hegemony's Era

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +6% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
10% chance to gain a Power Charge if you Knock an Enemy Back with Melee Damage

lines.flavourText:
The right to rule demands mental acuity,
a strong arm,
And a tenacious sense of justice.

lines.name: Ichimonji

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Effect of Buffs on you
10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Allies' Aura Buffs do not affect you
Your Aura Buffs do not affect allies

lines.flavourText: Master yourself before you seek to master others.

lines.name: Jack, the Axe

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Thirst for Blood Skill
25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
+(25-35)% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding from Hits with this Weapon

lines.flavourText: "More blood... hack open flesh... must drink..."

lines.name: Kikazaru

explicitModifiers.text: (60-72)% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText: Hear no evil.

Attack Skills have Added Lightning Damage equal to 6% of maximum Mana

lines.flavourText:
You think we do not know.
We know all that you think.

lines.name: Mon'tregul's Grasp

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced maximum number of Raised Zombies

Raised Zombies have +(25-30)% to all Resistances
Enemies Killed by Zombies' Hits Explode, dealing 50% of their Life as Fire Damage
Raised Zombies deal (100-125)% more Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: With death as my ally, all the world is within my grasp.

lines.name: Mutewind Whispersteps

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (25-30) to (40-50) Cold Damage to Spells
(50-70)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

lines.flavourText:
Corruption sweeps across this land,
but our bloodline is clear.
It is our duty to keep it so.

lines.name: Nycta's Lantern
lines.flavourText:
Left in her tomb by the lynch mob, 
the flame inside still blazed bright after her death, 
and so did hers.

lines.name: Obscurantis

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Projectile Attack Damage per 200 Accuracy Rating

lines.flavourText: If you know where to strike, you need only strike once.

lines.name: Praxis

explicitModifiers.text: -(8-4) to Total Mana Cost of Skills
8% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

lines.flavourText:
The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,
as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.

lines.name: Razor of the Seventh Sun

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
100% increased Burning Damage if you've Ignited an Enemy Recently
Recover 1% of Life when you Ignite an Enemy
100% increased Melee Physical Damage against Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Quickly cooled the steel,
but never could it forget
the heat of the forge.

Arrows fired from the first firing points always Pierce

Arrows fired from the third firing points Return to you
Arrows fired from the fourth firing points Chain +2 times

lines.flavourText: We stand together. We strike together.

lines.name: Reverberation Rod

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (9-11) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Controlled Destruction

lines.flavourText: If it's worth doing once, it's worth doing twice.

lines.name: Rime Gaze

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Concentrated Effect
+50% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier

lines.flavourText: The malice in her gaze froze blood and shattered bone.

lines.name: Silverbranch

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

lines.flavourText:
"The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui

lines.name: Singularity

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-10) to (150-200) Lightning Damage to Spells
Nearby Enemies are Hindered, with 25% reduced Movement Speed
100% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Hindered Enemies

lines.flavourText:
In time, all becomes nothing.
We just expedite the process.

lines.name: Snakepit

explicitModifiers.text: Left ring slot: Projectiles from Spells cannot Chain
Left ring slot: Projectiles from Spells Fork
Right ring slot: Projectiles from Spells Chain +1 times
Right ring slot: Projectiles from Spells cannot Fork

lines.flavourText:
They wrap around you
until your blood turns as cold as theirs.

lines.name: Soulthirst

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Soul Eater during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"They say a draught of fine spirits will ward off
the elements and promote a longer, merrier life.
I have found this to be true on all counts." 
- Zerphi of the Vaal

lines.name: Taryn's Shiver

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Cold Spell Skill Gems
Enemies Frozen by you take 20% increased Damage

lines.flavourText:
Shed by the winged beast of night,
A scaly frost-encrusted thorn.
All who feel its wintry light
Shiver in pain at the frozen dawn.

lines.name: The Bringer of Rain

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Melee Physical Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Faster Attacks
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 30 Blind
Adds 20 to 30 Physical Damage to Attacks
20% chance to gain an Endurance Charge when you Block

lines.flavourText:
"What lies beneath your feet?!"
"Sacred ground, watered with tears of blood!"

lines.name: The Dark Seer

explicitModifiers.text: 10% Global chance to Blind Enemies on hit
Enemies Blinded by you while you are Blinded have Malediction

lines.flavourText:
Feed on the light of the living,
Bring darkness to all I see,
Until we are one in shadow.

lines.name: The Searing Touch

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-60)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
+2 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
Burn to cinders, scar and maim,
Rule a world, bathed in flame.

lines.name: Ungil's Harmony

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage

lines.flavourText: Gentle anger, raging calm.

lines.name: Ylfeban's Trickery

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Shock Ground when Hit

Curse Enemies which Hit you with a random Hex, ignoring Curse Limit

lines.flavourText:
An angry god is one thing, 
but you should really fear a god 
with an unpredictable sense of humour.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Flame

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Trigger Level 16 Molten Burst on Melee Hit
60% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The Karui savages claim the weapon was forged by their fire god.
I'm rather inclined to believe them."
- Fairgraves, Renowned Explorer

lines.name: Tinkerskin

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for throwing Traps

30% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 100 Life when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 50 Energy Shield when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Thin is the line between mechanical genius and magic.

lines.name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Chance to Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

lines.name: Leper's Alms

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies

lines.flavourText: One's burden is another's gift.

lines.name: Lightpoacher

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Spirit Burst when you Use a Skill while you have a Spirit Charge
+1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
Gain 5% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element per Spirit Charge

lines.flavourText:
The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

lines.name: Augyre

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Every 16 seconds you gain Elemental Overload for 8 seconds
You have Resolute Technique while you do not have Elemental Overload
100% increased Physical Damage while you have Resolute Technique

lines.flavourText:
When the world spins out of control,
the safest place to be is in the centre.

lines.name: Stormfire

explicitModifiers.text: (8-14)% increased Burning Damage for each time you have Shocked a Non-Shocked Enemy Recently, up to a maximum of 120%
Adds (1-3) to (62-84) Lightning Damage to Hits against Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText:
When your skin sloughs, and your blood cooks,
you'll wish the lightning strike had killed you.

lines.name: Thundersight
lines.flavourText: See creation as it is, energetic and storming.

lines.name: Galesight
lines.flavourText: See creation as it will be, frozen and silent.

lines.name: Maw of Conquest

explicitModifiers.text: (60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
(10-20)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText:
Young Napuatzi was thrown into the pits, an unwilling sacrifice, 
but the offer of her blood was refused. 
She rose from the pit alive and anew.  
A Leader. A Conquerer. A Viper.

lines.name: Tavukai

explicitModifiers.text: Summon Raging Spirit has (20-30)% increased Duration

Summoned Raging Spirits take (20-24)% of their Maximum Life per second as Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Hyrri and her arrows broke the sacred code, damning herself. 
Kaom seized her sacrifice, and in doing so, seized victory." 
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Leash of Oblation

explicitModifiers.text: You can have an Offering of each type

lines.flavourText: Those who offer up sacrifices to every deity entreat the full favour of none.

lines.name: Eye of Malice

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to inflict Cold Exposure on Hit
25% chance to inflict Fire Exposure on Hit
Nearby Enemies have 50% increased Fire and Cold Resistances

lines.flavourText:
Through vision coloured by burning rage and icy hate
peers a visitor from a realm of ill intent...

lines.name: Beacon of Madness

All Damage inflicts Poison while affected by Glorious Madness

Immune to Elemental Ailments while affected by Glorious Madness

lines.flavourText: Nothing spreads as quickly as an idea.

lines.name: Algor Mortis

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% chance to Sap Enemies in Chilling Areas

lines.flavourText: Winter's white blanket swaddles all.

lines.flavourText: Lightning lives in an endless circle.

lines.name: Plume of Pursuit

explicitModifiers.text: Spell Skills always deal Critical Strikes on final Repeat

lines.flavourText: A dance as old as time.

lines.name: The Admiral

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Elemental Damage you Deal with Hits is Resisted by lowest Elemental Resistance instead

lines.flavourText:
The Oriathans built their empire on naval mobility, which allowed
them to wage war wherever their enemy was weakest.

lines.name: Chains of Emancipation

explicitModifiers.text: Enemy Hits inflict Temporal Chains on you

Immune to Curses while you have at least 25 Rage

lines.flavourText: Freedom is won only by those who are not free.

lines.name: The Gluttonous Tide

(20-40)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
To eat, to feast, to forget the horror of endless agonising existence
if but for a moment... only to disgorge and do it all again...

lines.flavourText:
A multitude of beings share a wretched existence
irrevocably bound together in perpetual torture.

lines.name: Sudden Dawn

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance for Energy Shield Recharge to start when you Kill an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Where that searing dawn fell, silence reigned.
We sought the shadows, but none remained.

lines.name: Thrillsteel
lines.flavourText:
We may fight, and we may die, but in these
moments of blood and battle, we truly live.

lines.name: The Poised Prism

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 2 Cold Damage to Attacks per 10 Dexterity

lines.flavourText: What do you see when you look inward?

Maximum 1 Buff from an Active Ancestor Totem at a time

lines.flavourText:
In a void strewn with incandescent stardust,
the emissary of flame traverses interplanetary space
consuming the knowledge of fallen civilisations.

10% chance to gain Onslaught for 4 Seconds when Leech is
removed by Filling Unreserved Life

lines.flavourText:
There is no greater thrill than leaping into combat,
slashing and hewing with utmost abandon.

lines.flavourText:
We move to be closer to her, but the distance yet grows.

lines.name: Kahuturoa's Certainty
lines.flavourText: Confidence is calm and measured.

explicitModifiers.text: Life Leech from Exerted Attacks is instant

lines.flavourText: Fight in the traditional Way, or not at all!

lines.flavourText:
The respect of Karui warriors is hard to earn,
but lasts a lifetime... and beyond.

lines.name: Contract: Death to Darnaw

"If Admiral Darnaw is stupid enough to send orders to his fleet members 
and not expect us to steal them, then he deserves what's coming to him!"

lines.flavourText:
You shall be weighed and measured. You shall be judged...
and perhaps you shall be found worthy.

lines.name: Brinerot Flag

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Warcry Gems
Warcries grant Arcane Surge to you and Allies, with 10% increased effect per 5 power, up to 50%

lines.flavourText: The lords of the sea bow to no one.

lines.name: Abberath's Horn

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (3-4) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-6) to (8-12) Fire Damage to Spells
Gain 10 Life per Ignited Enemy Killed

lines.flavourText:
The Goat King drank the smoke and ate the flames
as his ruin spread across the land.

lines.name: Advancing Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 12 Fortify
Reflects (71-90) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
"A man cowers behind his walls.
A woman carries her fortress with her.
In heart, in mind, in hand."
- Sekhema Deshret

lines.name: Al Dhih

explicitModifiers.text: 3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Enemies Taunted by your Warcries Explode on death, dealing 8% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage
Warcry Skills' Cooldown Time is 4 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"When the hyena howls thrice
death is sure to follow."
-Maraketh Wisdom

lines.name: Alberon's Warpath

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks

Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you
Summon Skeletons cannot Summon more than 1 Skeleton Warrior

lines.flavourText:
Alberon walked among the accursed,
and they welcomed him.

lines.name: Allure

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: You gain Phasing for 10 seconds on using a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText:
What drives us to kill, to carve and to shred?
What drives us to drink the seething souls of the dead?
What drives us to love and to hold, but still go amiss?
What drives us to leave this world for the Abyss?

lines.name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Gain up to maximum Endurance Charges when you take a Critical Strike
Your nearby party members maximum Endurance Charges is equal to yours

lines.flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

lines.name: Andvarius
lines.flavourText: Danger is the price of wealth.

lines.name: Araku Tiki

explicitModifiers.text: +(150-250) to Evasion Rating while on Low Life
Gain Elusive on reaching Low Life
You have Phasing while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
It is said to make you invisible when the Great
Spirit comes to take you on your final journey.

lines.name: Ascent From Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: You have Phasing if Energy Shield Recharge has started Recently

lines.flavourText:
A single step forward
Snap free from the prison
Reborn into freedom eternal

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: (75-150)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(60-30) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Aurumvorax
lines.flavourText:
Many a collector of rarities discovered to his dismay
that the intelligent spirit in this sword
does not like to share its master's attention

lines.name: Bated Breath
lines.flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

lines.name: Belt of the Deceiver

explicitModifiers.text: You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText:
In battle, virtue matters not. 
Only victory.

lines.name: Bloodplay

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"I'm a painter, and crimson is my chosen hue."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Bones of Ullr

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Raise Zombie Gems
+1 to Level of all Raise Spectre Gems

lines.flavourText:
The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: -(15-10) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
1000% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Breath of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Skills have 40% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Breathe deep, and give yourself over to eternity.

lines.name: Brightbeak
lines.flavourText:
"I know how to say 'faster' and 'attack'
in Karui, Marak and Ezo."
- Voll of Thebrus

lines.name: Brinerot Whalers
lines.flavourText:
Those Theopolis fatcats put a price on our heads.
Let's see what they'll pay for their own.

lines.name: Bronn's Lithe

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Movement Gems

lines.flavourText:
Forget your kite shield. Just put the biggest man
 in the field between you and the archers.

lines.name: Callinellus Malleus

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon
All Attack Damage Chills when you Stun

lines.flavourText:
To neither ebb nor flow,
but weather the rising tide,
outlast, unshifting and unshifted,
until the waters recede and we stand together.

lines.name: Cameria's Maul

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies
(30-40)% increased Cold Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"You'll have my riches when you pry them
from my cold, dead hands!"
"That's how I prefer it."

lines.name: Carnage Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (1.2-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(50-51)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

lines.flavourText:
Forged from the blood of countless wars, 
its thirst has only begun.

lines.name: Chalice of Horrors

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
100% Chance to Cause Monster to Flee on Block
+20% Chance to Block Attack Damage from Cursed Enemies
Inflict Decay on Enemies you Curse with Hex Skills, dealing 700 Chaos Damage per Second for 8 Seconds

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye. A curse for a curse.

lines.name: Chernobog's Pillar

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
25% chance to Curse Non-Cursed Enemies with Enfeeble on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Fire dances with those who doubt
Licks the skin and flesh from the fearful
Where there is no fear
There is no flame

lines.name: Cherrubim's Maleficence

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The Consort of Chaos descended,
swiftly, brutally, artfully, she consumed the living,
leaving naught behind but a Rosemarie bloom,
to celebrate the massacre."
- Blass, explorer, hunter, adventurer

lines.name: Chin Sol

explicitModifiers.text: 50% more Damage with Arrow Hits at Close Range

lines.flavourText:
As a soldier you want to get close to enemy archers.
That is not the case when fighting the Maraketh.

lines.name: Chober Chaber

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems

lines.flavourText: The faithful may continue to serve, even after death.

lines.name: Clayshaper

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 12 Summon Stone Golem Skill
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Golems
Golems have (96-120) to (132-160) Added Attack Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
There is nothing, flesh, spirit, or stone
Free from our hunger for dominion.

lines.name: Craghead

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 6 to 10 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText: Hit them hard. Hit them once.

lines.name: Crest of Perandus

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"With piety and justice."
- Perandus family motto

lines.name: Crown of the Pale King

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-0.8)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Reflects 100 to 150 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
100% of Damage you Reflect to Enemies when Hit is leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
A lightless world
a silent reign
two sightless eyes
feed on your pain.

lines.name: Crown of Thorns

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
+25 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Lift it lightly, don it slow.
The spikes point out and in, you know.

lines.name: Cybil's Paw

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (15-20) Life per Enemy Hit with Spells
8% increased Spell Damage per 5% Chance to Block Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
Tread lightly, lest their vigil find you.
Speak softly, lest their reason fend you.
Cut gently, lest their spirit haunt you.

lines.name: Daresso's Passion

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(60-80)% increased Damage while you have no Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
It doesn't matter how well the young swordsman trains.
All form and finesse are forgotten when blood first hits the ground.

lines.name: Daresso's Salute

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
60% increased Melee Damage when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
"A bit short in the arm, are you? 
Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."
- Daresso the Daring

lines.name: Death's Hand

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Stun
Gain Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
"All are welcome in Hinekora's eternal home." 
- Karui Proverb

lines.name: Deerstalker

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Trap
15% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Deidbell

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot Leech when on Low Life
Skills which Exert an Attack have (20-40)% chance to not count that Attack

lines.flavourText: May you never hear it toll.

lines.name: Doedre's Damning

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse

lines.flavourText:
Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

lines.name: Doedre's Scorn

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Curse Skills have (30-50)% increased Skill Effect Duration
Adds 37 to 71 Chaos Damage for each Curse on the Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,
A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

lines.name: Doedre's Tenure
lines.flavourText:
While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style,
she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

lines.name: Doomsower

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Melee Gems have 15% increased Area of Effect
Attack Skills gain 5% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage per Socketed Red Gem
You have Vaal Pact while all Socketed Gems are Red

lines.flavourText:
So the seed of hate was born,
Evil forged and Hope forsworn.

lines.name: Dreadarc

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit

lines.flavourText:
The fastest way to a man's heart
is through his sternum.

lines.name: Dream Fragments
lines.flavourText:
Doryani stumbled into a realm of madness
And awoke its Master.

lines.name: Drillneck

explicitModifiers.text: (10-14) to (19-24) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Arrows deal 50% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments to Targets they Pierce

lines.flavourText:
"Why waste such a fine arrow on just one man?" 
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Dusktoe

explicitModifiers.text: +50% to Chaos Resistance during any Flask Effect
Adds (30-40) to (50-60) Chaos Damage to Spells and Attacks during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"A lick of shadow may ease 
the petty frictions of one's life."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Dyadus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (255-285) to (300-330) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (255-285) to (300-330) Cold Damage in Off Hand
25% chance to Ignite when in Main Hand
100% increased Damage with Ignite inflicted on Chilled Enemies
Chill Enemies for 1 second on Hit with this Weapon when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
Born of love, forged in blood
He burned as a torch in the blackest night
She shone as ice in the winter sun
Proudly, fiercely
At their mother's side, forever.

lines.name: Edge of Madness

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems
Adds 1 to 2 Physical Damage to Attacks per Level

lines.flavourText:
Soon, the pleas for mercy were muted.
Only one voice remained.
Laughing.

lines.name: Emberwake

explicitModifiers.text: You can inflict an additional Ignite on an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Leave the world in flames behind you.

lines.name: Empire's Grasp

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Knockback

lines.flavourText:
"I like my vassals at sword point,
but my enemies as close as the hilt."
- Emperor Chitus

lines.name: Essence Worm

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled

lines.flavourText:
"This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.
Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
- Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Extractor Mentis

explicitModifiers.text: 5% chance to grant Onslaught to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Unholy Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
10% chance to gain Onslaught for 10 seconds on Kill
10% chance to gain Unholy Might for 10 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
