When slaughtered flesh falls silent,
the soul may yet scream on.

lines.name: Eye of Innocence

explicitModifiers.text: Take (100-103) Fire Damage when you Ignite an Enemy
2% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life while Ignited

lines.flavourText:
"...and so He said: 'Let only the good meet my gaze'
and no eye met His. So He called down the cleansing flames
and let black smoke sweep the Sinners away."
- Book of Innocence

lines.name: Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of servitude, a day
of glory, an eternity of death.

lines.name: Facebreaker

explicitModifiers.text: (600-800)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Melee Attacks

lines.flavourText: Fly like a Storm Crow, crush like a Rhoa

lines.name: Fairgraves' Tricorne

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 15 to 25 Cold Damage to Attacks
You can be Touched by Tormented Spirits

lines.flavourText:
Fairgraves' trusty tricorne accompanied him far across
the seas, deep under the ground, and even beyond death.

lines.name: Faminebind

explicitModifiers.text: Deals 50 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies

lines.flavourText:
After the Great Fire, the land lay barren
and our forefathers grew weak.
Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

lines.name: Feastbind

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 10 Physical Damage to Attacks
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Flask Charges gained during any Flask Effect
50% increased Mana Regeneration Rate during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Our forefathers danced and drank and ate their fill
and did not honour the First Ones for their gifts.
So the First Ones filled the sky with fire.

lines.name: Femurs of the Saints

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
+1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per Summoned Skeleton
2% increased Attack and Cast Speed per Summoned Raging Spirit
Regenerate 0.6% of Life per second for each Raised Zombie
30% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Raised Spectre

lines.flavourText:
"They spent a lifetime in the service of God, 
only to spend eternity in the service of me." 
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: Fencoil

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 8 Trap

lines.flavourText:
You've no reason for fear when you're a root in a fen
- Old Ezomyte saying.

lines.name: Fidelitas' Spike

explicitModifiers.text: Herald of Thunder has 50% increased Buff Effect

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro was transformed by Raulo's love.
Thaumaturgy allowed Maligaro to return the favour.

lines.name: Flesh and Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: Kills grant an additional Vaal Soul if you have Rampaged Recently

lines.flavourText:
What is greed but trading a mountain of death
for a sliver of life?

lines.name: Flesh-Eater

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
3% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Bleeding Enemies
30% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
I suffer, I long, with thirst to slake.
Though countless corpses lie in wake.

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: +1000 to Evasion Rating while on Full Life
30% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Frostbreath

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon deal Double Damage to Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A merciful murderer swept through the streets of Sarn
Robbing breath from the weak and worthless.

lines.name: Gang's Momentum

explicitModifiers.text: (25-40)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText: Become one with the unstoppable flame.

lines.name: Geofri's Baptism
lines.flavourText:
"One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

lines.name: Geofri's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Holy Relics

lines.flavourText:
In the battle for honour, Geofri won.
Not so, the battle for survival.

lines.name: Geofri's Sanctuary
lines.flavourText:
Faith does not make us invulnerable.
It makes us immortal.

lines.name: Gifts from Above

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Consecrate when you deal a Critical Strike
(40-50)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Enemies killed with a Critical Strike
50% increased Damage while on Consecrated Ground
+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while on Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: God blesses those who bless themselves.

lines.name: Gorebreaker
lines.flavourText:
Sure, there's many a hard man out there.
But this'll soften them up.

lines.name: Goredrill

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
A tap on the shoulder
A peck on the cheek
A sip of your wine
So red and so sleek

lines.name: Great Old One's Ward

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The horrors we've encountered are nothing
compared to the horrors we haven't.

lines.name: Hezmana's Bloodlust

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
40% increased Attack Speed if you've taken a Savage Hit Recently
Attacks Cost Life instead of Mana

lines.flavourText: When a craving cannot be sated, any source will do.

lines.name: Hiltless

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Lifetap
Enemies you Attack Reflect 100 Physical Damage to you

lines.flavourText:
The cuts on my hands are a small price to pay
for the opportunity to drive my steel
beyond the flesh and into the demon's soul.

lines.name: Honourhome

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 30 Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"The craven mind is sharp with self interest.
The honourable mind is much easier to manipulate."
 - Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Hrimnor's Hymn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

lines.name: Hyaon's Fury

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Damage taken per Frenzy Charge
(15-20)% increased Lightning Damage per Frenzy Charge
20 Life gained on Kill per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Hyaon the 'Red Wolf'
Howling mad
Cloaked in blood
A banner to his legion
A terror to his foes."
- Garivaldi, Chronicler to the Empire

lines.name: Icetomb

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you

lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Infractem
lines.flavourText:
Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

lines.name: Innsbury Edge

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Attacks with this Weapon Maim on hit

lines.flavourText:
A sword he brought, his foes to maim and rend,
from places dark behind forbidden doors,
but night by night he woke with frighten'd roars
from ghoulish dreams, too strange to comprehend.

lines.name: Iron Commander

explicitModifiers.text: Siege Ballista has +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems per 200 Dexterity
Adds 1 to 3 Physical Damage to Attacks per 25 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
The Eternals commanded an army that need not eat, sleep, or breathe
without the usual depravities of necromancy.

lines.name: Jaws of Agony

explicitModifiers.text: -(18-14) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
25% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Throw a Trap

lines.flavourText:
One wrong step triggers destruction. 
Agony slowly dominates the will to live.

lines.name: Jorrhast's Blacksteel

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 20 Animate Weapon on Kill
Weapons you Animate create an additional copy

lines.flavourText:
His flesh had long turned to dust,
but his vengeance lived on
in every scrap of iron he touched.

lines.name: Kaltenhalt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Reflects (25-50) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.

lines.name: Kaom's Primacy

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 1 Rage on Critical Hit with attacks, no more than once every 0.5 seconds
Gain 1% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1 Rage

lines.flavourText:
One by one, Kaom slaughtered the weakest tribe
leaders until the others leapt to join his cause.

lines.name: Kaom's Sign
lines.flavourText:
A token from the sea
A sign for Kaom
to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Kitava's Thirst

explicitModifiers.text:
50% chance to Trigger Socketed Spells when you Spend at least 100 Mana on an
Upfront Cost to Use or Trigger a Skill, with a 0.1 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama, Tawhoa and Kitava went to the lake to fish.
Tawhoa weaved a net to catch the fish,
Tukohama built a fire to cook the fish,
and Kitava swallowed the entire lake, fish and all, with a single gulp.

lines.name: Kondo's Pride

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Melee Damage against Bleeding Enemies
Cannot Leech Life from Critical Strikes
30% chance to Blind Enemies on Critical Strike
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Faintly gleaming in the moonlit night,
Kondo's Pride was primed to fight.
Driven by an inner fire,
bloodlust, spite and ill desire.
He swiftly moved to strike them all,
wreaking havoc like a steel squall.

lines.name: Kongor's Undying Rage

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage
You gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: Command like a king and nothing will stand in your way.

lines.name: Lakishu's Blade

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 1 Multistrike

lines.flavourText:
"May the Blessed Lakishu watch our backs and our wives."
- Legionnaire Battle Blessing

lines.name: Last Resort

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
100% increased Claw Physical Damage when on Low Life
100% increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Desperate times demand desperate measures.

lines.name: Lavianga's Wisdom
lines.flavourText:
"The painful memories are the easiest to recall."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects 30 Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
100% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: Limbsplit

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems
Trigger Level 1 Gore Shockwave on Melee Hit if you have at least 150 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.

lines.name: Lioneye's Paws

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 5 Rain of Arrows when you Attack with a Bow
Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
Stand and lead the righteous pride,
Fight till death, never hide.

lines.name: Lioneye's Vision

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pierce
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
"The Virtue Gems are a gift from the land, 
our land, and we will not let our gifts
be destroyed by savages."
- Marceus Lioneye

lines.name: Lori's Lantern

explicitModifiers.text: (6-8)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
+(20-25)% to Chaos Resistance when on Low Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
By its light, Lori led her young charges to safety 
and bound up their wounds. 
Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle 
and proof against hate.

lines.name: Malachai's Artifice

explicitModifiers.text: +(75-120)% to Fire Resistance when Socketed with a Red Gem
+(75-120)% to Cold Resistance when Socketed with a Green Gem
+(75-115)% to Lightning Resistance when Socketed with a Blue Gem

lines.flavourText:
When the wind blows, 
Know which way to bend
and watch the others break.

lines.name: Malachai's Simula

explicitModifiers.text: Spells have a 20% chance to deal Double Damage

lines.flavourText:
It was a sliver of Malachai's soul
that animated the first Eternal Guardian.

lines.name: Maligaro's Lens

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby allies Recover 1% of your Maximum Life when you Die

lines.flavourText:
"Look around you. What do you see? 
Corruption, perversion, sin?
No. It is progress. 
You simply lack the means to see it." 
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Maligaro's Restraint

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (30-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks
Shocks you cause are reflected back to you

lines.flavourText:
"Our genius will pave the way forward.
May all who are worthy be improved!"
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Mark of the Doubting Knight

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
50% chance to Cause Bleeding on Critical Strike
50% chance to Cause Poison on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Nothing is pure.
Slice open the Innocent
And spill a thousand Sins.

lines.name: Matua Tupuna

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
20% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills on your Minions
20% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
You carried me through life,
The least I can do is carry you through death.

lines.name: Meginord's Girdle

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (10-12) to (20-24) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Kaom's strength was rivaled only by
the great Meginord of the north.

lines.name: Midnight Bargain

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be used with Chaos Inoculation
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
A chilling hush, a scraping sound
Of things no more entombed in ground.
A shambling horde is on its way
To crush the very light of day.

lines.name: Mightflay
lines.flavourText: A mighty beast, a lavish feast.

lines.name: Mindspiral

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
Enemies Cannot Leech Mana From you
(10-20)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

lines.flavourText: Where top is bottom and weak is strong.

lines.name: Mokou's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: All Damage Taken from Hits can Ignite you

lines.flavourText: Fire makes the perfect blossom in the endless night.

lines.name: Moonbender's Wing

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 15 Lightning Warp on Hit with this Weapon
Hits with this Weapon gain (75-100)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold or Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
Beneath the cold light of the moon,
the wing moves faster than the eye.

lines.name: Moonsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 20 Blind
10% chance to Blind Enemies on hit

lines.flavourText:
Cast into darkness
And trapped for a thousand years,
The lonely moon weeps

lines.name: Mortem Morsu

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon

lines.flavourText:
Fear blisters the heart and thins the blood.
Fear squeezes lungs and sets the guts to fester.
Fear is the wound left untended.

lines.name: Mutewind Pennant

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Onslaught for 4 seconds when you Warcry

lines.flavourText: Embrace the snow or be buried.

lines.name: Mutewind Seal

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have 20% increased Attack and Cast Speed
Gain Onslaught for 10 seconds when you Cast Socketed Golem Skill
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems
Adds (5-10) to (11-15) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When a fallen leader's body is taken to the funeral peak,
those who seek power must ascend together.
One returns with the seal. 
The rest do not return at all.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Recover (20-36) Life when you Ignite an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Ngamahu,
a sign to the Karui to spread like fire.
Given to Akoya, but inherited by Kaom with the swing of his axe.

lines.name: Nomic's Storm

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage taken while on Full Energy Shield
20% increased Movement Speed while on Full Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: It takes a clear mind to outrun a storm.

lines.name: Null and Void

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Immunity to Physical Damage for 1.5 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText:
What is freedom but a clean slate
in an unclean world?

lines.name: Null's Inclination

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Socketed Minion Spells on Kill with this Weapon
Minion Spells Triggered by this Item have a 0.25 second Cooldown with 5 Uses
Minions deal 1% increased Damage per 5 Dexterity

lines.flavourText: The hunt continues when the prey falls.

lines.name: Nuro's Harp

explicitModifiers.text: 15% chance to create Chilled Ground when you Freeze an Enemy
Create Consecrated Ground when you Shatter an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Night's frost becomes morning's dew
Darkness cleansed, pure and new.

lines.name: Ondar's Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Attack Speed when on Full Life
Adds (1-4) to (30-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks
20% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
A single lightning strike fells a man.
A single knife stroke fells an empire.

lines.name: Ornament of the East

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Dexterity Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Faster Attacks

lines.flavourText: To the Maraketh, death is as intimate as love.

lines.name: Oro's Sacrifice

implicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy Charge if an Attack Ignites an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Give yourself to the flames and your name
will burn in the minds of men forever.

lines.name: Perandus Blazon

explicitModifiers.text: -2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

lines.name: Prismatic Eclipse

explicitModifiers.text: +8% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
25% increased Global Physical Damage with Weapons per Red Socket
12% increased Global Attack Speed per Green Socket
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Blue Socket
+0.2 metres to Melee Strike Range per White Socket
+2 to Melee Strike Range per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
"A raging Solaris seared and contorted the orb's surface. 
A despairing Lunaris filled the scars with her tears. 
Yet Viridi remained, trapped within, forever more."
 - Azmerian Creation Myth

lines.name: Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-19) to (30-38) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (10-14) to (24-33) Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to (60-81) Lightning Damage to Attacks
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle

lines.name: Quecholli

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Killed with Attack or Spell Hits Explode, dealing 10% of their Life as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The finest prosperity grows from the direst
carnage. Such is the nature of progress."
- Doryani of the Vaal

lines.name: Queen's Decree

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

lines.name: Rashkaldor's Patience

explicitModifiers.text: 20% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Items and Gems have 10% increased Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText: Fate's smile, man's ruin.

lines.name: Rat's Nest
lines.flavourText:
A lad with no fear of the pest 
Let rats fill his helmet in jest 
When they picked his skull clean
Where his head should have been
Was naught but a vermin-filled nest!

lines.name: Realmshaper

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Cold to Fire

lines.flavourText:
"God's creations always begin and end
with flames and ice.
We should count ourselves lucky when we see neither."
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Reaper's Pursuit

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Accept your fate, or lie, pretend.
Death collects you in the end.

lines.name: Redbeak

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Damage when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: As battle calms, blood turns to rust.

lines.name: Relentless Fury

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You gain Onslaught for 3 seconds on Culling Strike
100% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Onslaught

lines.flavourText:
Relentless fury
Sunder my every foe
Fuel my boiling blood

lines.name: Repentance
lines.flavourText:
"I ask not for understanding,
only for forgiveness
for what I am about to do.
There will be blood on these shackles yet."
- Anonymous carving, Axiom Prison.

lines.name: Rigwald's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Today, clansmen, my sword is my voice!"
- Rigwald, at the Battle of Glarryn

lines.name: Rigwald's Command

explicitModifiers.text: +10% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
+1% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding per Rage while wielding an Axe

lines.flavourText:
Fear not death. Turn to him, face him.
And smile as he sinks his teeth
into the throats of our oppressors.

lines.name: Rigwald's Savagery

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Physical Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
+25 to Maximum Rage while wielding a Sword

lines.flavourText:
Tear the flesh from the bone. 
Turn the bone to dust.
Scatter the dust to the wind.

lines.name: Rise of the Phoenix

explicitModifiers.text: +25% to Fire Resistance while on Low Life
10% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
100% chance to Avoid being Ignited while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
My bearer shall be guarded by flame,
for I am the phoenix, forever radiant in glory.

lines.name: Rive

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
2% increased Physical Damage Over Time per 10 Dexterity
30% Chance to cause Bleeding Enemies to Flee on hit

lines.flavourText:
Terror doesn't make you jump.
Terror makes you run.

lines.name: Romira's Banquet

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Gain a Power Charge on Non-Critical Strike
Lose all Power Charges on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
The Empress gave Romira two sons
Born of his brother's seed
Romira threw her a banquet
A perfidious meal indeed.

lines.name: Roth's Reach

explicitModifiers.text: (60-80)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Exiled to the sea; what a joke. 
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

lines.name: Sadima's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

lines.name: Scaeva

explicitModifiers.text: 0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life per Red Socket
+10% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier per Green Socket
0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Blue Socket
8% increased Global Defences per White Socket
(60-80)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance when in Main Hand
+8% Chance to Block Attack Damage when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
Even from the back rows,
the whistling steel was mesmerising.
They watched the dance in the arena dust, silent as the dead.
A spell only broken by the spilling of blood.

lines.name: Sentari's Answer

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Punishment when you Block their Melee Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains when you Block their Projectile Attack Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness when you Block their Spell Damage, ignoring Curse Limit

lines.flavourText:
Open your eyes and you will see the cracks in your enemy's walls.
Open your mind and you will see the cracks in your enemy's plans.

lines.name: Shackles of the Wretched

explicitModifiers.text: Hexes applied by Socketed Curse Skills are Reflected back to you
You cannot be Chilled for 3 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 3 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 3 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 3 seconds after being Shocked
You grant (4-6) Frenzy Charges to allies on Death

lines.flavourText: Captivity breeds creativity.

lines.name: Shadows and Dust

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Creates a Smoke Cloud on Rampage
Gain Unholy Might for 3 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText:
What is fear but a snuffed torch
and death in the wind?

lines.name: Shaper's Seed

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Allies gain 4% of Life Regenerated per second
Nearby Allies gain 80% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

lines.flavourText: The first light to grow in the primordial darkness.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: Shiversting

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
Stoic visage, icy heart.
Life of sorrow, lived apart.

lines.name: Sibyl's Lament

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-16) to (20-28) Fire Damage to Attacks
Left ring slot: You and your Minions take 80% reduced Reflected Elemental Damage
Right ring slot: You and your Minions take 80% reduced Reflected Physical Damage
(20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
The portrait reflected his pain,
a pain that she could never see.

lines.name: Sidhebreath

explicitModifiers.text: Minions convert 50% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage
Minions deal (25-35) to (50-65) additional Cold Damage

lines.flavourText: The breath of life is yours to give.

lines.name: Sin Trek

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Cannot Leech Life From you

lines.flavourText: Do not let them step on your feet. Keep them at bay.

lines.name: Sire of Shards

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems fire Projectiles in a circle

lines.flavourText: That which was broken may yet break.

lines.name: Skirmish

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Attack Skills have +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
If two great leaders like Lioneye and Kaom
had been on the same side of the battle,
nothing would remain unconquered.

lines.name: Skullhead

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Minions have +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage
Minions Recover 10% of their Life when they Block

lines.flavourText:
All that was left of the Iron King was his bleached skull.
Yet it was all the Iron King needed.

lines.name: Slitherpinch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
A soft caress in dead of night,
that slips about the neck, so tight.

lines.name: Slivertongue

explicitModifiers.text: (150-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance with arrows that Fork
Arrows Pierce all Targets after Forking
Arrows that Pierce have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier

lines.flavourText: A hundred blind heads, each seeking the taste of prey on the air.

lines.name: Snakebite

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge
10% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration per Frenzy Charge
Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
+5% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Poison per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

lines.name: Solaris Lorica

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Spell Totem
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Soul Strike

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Critical Strike Chance with Bows

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (13-18) to (26-32) Chaos Damage to Attacks
80% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge

lines.flavourText:
In this chaotic world
The rewards of the Soul
Outlast the rewards of the Flesh.

lines.name: Springleaf

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 100 Life per Second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: From death springs life.

lines.name: Starkonja's Head

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced Damage when on Low Life
150% increased Global Evasion Rating when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
There was no hero made out of Starkonja's death,
but merely a long sleep made eternal.

lines.name: Steppan Eard

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed on Shocked Ground
Regenerate 2% of Life per second on Chilled Ground

lines.flavourText:
To fight an enemy on their lands is a tactical mistake. 
Make those lands your own, and the mistake becomes theirs.

lines.name: Stone of Lazhwar
lines.flavourText:
You are slow, foolish and ignorant.
I am not.

lines.name: Storm Cloud
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire
into very effective lightning rods.

lines.name: Sundance
lines.flavourText:
Blazing body, shining bold.
Dance beneath the orb of gold!

lines.name: Surgebinders

explicitModifiers.text: (4-7)% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
(4-7)% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
(4-7)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

lines.name: Tasalio's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-12) to (15-22) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (40-48) to (60-72) Cold Damage against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Tasalio, God of Water,
to the chieftain Rakiata.
Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand
so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

lines.name: Tear of Purity

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Purity of Elements Skill

lines.flavourText:
A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Terminus Est

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy Charge on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
His final sensation was of the executioner's blade.
It was not cold, instead warm and reassuring,
murmuring a promise of better times ahead.
Smiling, he returned death's embrace.

lines.name: The Anvil

explicitModifiers.text: +3% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
Reflects 240 to 300 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText: Forge your Perseverance on the Anvil of Faith.

lines.name: The Aylardex

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge
1% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life per Power Charge
40% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
Shackled fires dance about;
Might within from force without.

lines.name: The Beast Fur Shawl
lines.flavourText:
The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

lines.name: The Blood Dance

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
4% reduced Attack and Cast Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate 0.8% of Life per second per Frenzy Charge
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(20-30)% increased Damage per Frenzy Charge with Hits against Enemies on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"Sharks thrash and swirl 
To the pounding drum of their frenzied hearts
As they dance in the waters red."
-Lavianga, Guardian of the Karui Way

lines.name: The Blood Reaper

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
To cease the flow of blood is to 
choke the rain in the very clouds.
Both life and land feel the thirst.

lines.name: The Blood Thorn

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +12% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
Reflects (22-44) Physical Damage to Attackers on Block
Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Block

lines.flavourText: Touch not the thorn, for only blood and pain await.

lines.name: The Broken Crown

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 20 Cast on Death
20% increased Damage when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Every rule has an exception.

lines.name: The Consuming Dark

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems
30% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Your Chaos Damage has 60% chance to Poison Enemies

lines.flavourText: The brightest flames cast the darkest shadows.

lines.name: The Dancing Dervish

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 15 Manifest Dancing Dervishes on Rampage
Manifested Dancing Dervishes disables both weapon slots
Manifested Dancing Dervishes die when Rampage ends

Melee Hits count as Rampage Kills
Rampage

lines.flavourText:
Take your partners by the hand,
Keep your steps in time.
Swing together, spin apart,
And dance with death sublime.

lines.name: The Deep One's Hide

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds 12 to 15 Cold Damage to Attacks
Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Block

lines.flavourText:
The thicker the shell,
the greater the beast that hunts it.

lines.name: The Goddess Bound

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
30% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
She paints her offer in wicked hues
An off-white grin, an elegant bruise.
To the nascent scourge she sings the ruse:
"With me in hand, what else need you use?"

lines.name: The Harvest

explicitModifiers.text: 1.2% of Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike
3% increased Global Critical Strike Chance per Level
Gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Let it grow and gather inside them,
Let it flow through their veins.
Don't waste a drop.

lines.name: The Ignomon

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (18-24) to (32-40) Fire Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: The light that reveals is the glare that blinds.

lines.name: The Princess

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (25-30)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
"She's pretty, aye. So pretty you'll
want to be with her long after you're dead."

lines.name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. 
Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate 75 Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: The Screaming Eagle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 2 Chance to Flee

lines.flavourText:
The eagle knows nothing
but the scream and the strike.

lines.name: The Stormheart

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Avoid being Shocked while Chilled

lines.flavourText:
When the storm comes,
the safest place to be is the centre.

lines.name: The Tempestuous Steel

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate 30% Elemental Resistances
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
The blade thrums with wild energy
Eager for vengeance against all who walk free.

lines.name: The Three Dragons

explicitModifiers.text: Your Fire Damage can Shock but not Ignite
Your Cold Damage can Ignite but not Freeze or Chill
Your Lightning Damage can Freeze but not Shock

lines.flavourText:
"The ice seared his naked feet
As the lightning stilled his heart,
But it was the flames upon his lover's face
That roused him to vengeance."
- From 'The Three Dragons' by Victario of Sarn

lines.name: The Warden's Brand

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-18) to (25-60) Physical Damage to Attacks
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"I don't always have a flame handy
when a fresh delinquent walks through our gates."
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Thief's Torment

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (40-72) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Gain (30-36) Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
(50-60)% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText:
The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

lines.name: Thousand Teeth Temu

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Reflects 1000 to 10000 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText:
Crimson burn'd the star of sadness,
All was woe that seem'd but gladness.

lines.name: Three-step Assault

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Move in with haste.
Strike quick, strike hard.
Vanish like smoke in the wind.

lines.name: Timeclasp

explicitModifiers.text: (6-14)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(6-12)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText:
"To us mere mortals, time is slippery. 
I'm just evening things out." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Titucius' Span

explicitModifiers.text: -(80-50) Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks
+25% chance to Block Projectile Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
A mighty bulwark, curved and strong
A dauntless wall, against the throng
All lance and arrow, knocked aside
For rout of foe, for turn of tide.

lines.name: Touch of Anguish

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Skills Chain an additional time while at maximum Frenzy Charges
Critical Strikes do not inherently Freeze

lines.flavourText:
Grip the frozen steel, feel it numb you.
Wield the cold touch of death like 
a splinter of your own shattered heart.

lines.name: Tremor Rod

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Spell Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Blastchain Mine
Mines can be Detonated an additional time

lines.flavourText:
The best way to gain the element of surprise,
is to let your enemy learn your plans,
and execute them - twice.

lines.name: Trolltimber Spire

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Area of Effect for Skills used by Totems
0.5% of Damage dealt by your Totems is Leeched to you as Life
You and your Totems Regenerate 0.5% of Life per second for each Summoned Totem

lines.flavourText:
The problem with working fresh trolltimber:
by the time you've carved out one end, 
the other has sprouted fresh roots!

lines.name: Twyzel

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems fire an additional Projectile

lines.flavourText:
Life persisted,
hardened, twisted.

lines.name: Umbilicus Immortalis

explicitModifiers.text: Flasks do not apply to you
Flasks you Use apply to your Raised Zombies and Spectres

lines.flavourText:
"The power of rebirth rivals that of immortality."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3

lines.name: Ungil's Gauche

explicitModifiers.text: +12% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding

lines.flavourText:
Unwieldy and garish became graceful
and deadly in Ungil's nimble hands.

lines.name: Valako's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Damage with Hits against Shocked Enemies
(1-1.01)% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Valako,
appointing Kiloava as the Herald of War.
A title Kaom claimed when he ended Kiloava's bloodline.

lines.name: Valyrium

explicitModifiers.text: Stun Threshold is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText: They will rise and fall in fire and blood.

lines.name: Veil of the Night

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 1 to (180-220) Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText:
The seeds of greatness are planted in darkness,
Watered by suffering,
Tended by desperation,
And bloom steel flowers of victory.

lines.name: Veruso's Battering Rams

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Melee Damage per Endurance Charge
You cannot be Shocked while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
With unending determination and resolve he destroyed first the gates, 
then the constructs guarding the tomb on the other side.

lines.name: Victario's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
5% increased Projectile Speed per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Projectile Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Grind your words into sharp thoughts.
Grind your thoughts into the sharpest of deeds."
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Victario's Charity

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% chance to grant a Power Charge to nearby Allies on Kill
5% chance to grant a Frenzy Charge to nearby Allies on Hit

lines.flavourText: A man's life is the greatest gift he can give.

lines.name: Victario's Flight

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
Quicksilver Flasks you Use also apply to nearby Allies

lines.flavourText:
Alive but not unscathed, Victario fled
as slaughter blossomed at the gates.

lines.name: Victario's Influence

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 45% increased Reservation Efficiency
(20-40)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Vis Mortis

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain (15-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Reap what others have sown
Muster them from their graves
Parade them for your pleasure
Zealots in mortis enslaved

lines.name: Voidbringer

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Elemental Gems
(125-150)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
Gain (15-20) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed
Lose (40-80) Mana when you use a Skill

lines.flavourText: Absolute corruption empowers absolutely.

lines.name: Voideye
lines.flavourText: The darker the eye, the more diligent the watched.

lines.name: Voidhome

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText: Cursed is the star whence it came.

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Wake of Destruction

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Drops Shocked Ground while moving, lasting 2 seconds

lines.flavourText:
Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

lines.name: Warped Timepiece
lines.flavourText:
As you have lived, so you shall die 
forever trying to keep up with me. 
Your blood on these hands of mine
forever makes me the public enemy.

lines.name: Wheel of the Stormsail

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Duration of Curses on you

lines.flavourText: Doomed to plunder forever.

lines.name: Wideswing

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Increased Area of Effect

lines.flavourText:
Bargg Wurmkin once severed the heads 
of seven men in a single cleave.

lines.name: Widowmaker

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Full Life
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Love only death
For she shall never let you go.

lines.name: Wildslash

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Attack Speed with Movement Skills

lines.flavourText:
There are two things to know about fighting:
When to swing like crazy, and when to run.

lines.name: Winterheart

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (10-10.1)% of Life per second while Frozen

lines.flavourText:
Those who dwell in the deep freeze
enjoy a special kind of madness.

lines.name: Wondertrap

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Wonders abound at death's door.

lines.name: Wurm's Molt

explicitModifiers.text: (2-2.4)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(2-2.4)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
(500-1200)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(500-1102)% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

lines.flavourText:
They say a lifetime of wisdom is carried
in every skin the great beasts shed.

lines.name: Wyrmsign

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Concentrated Effect
4% reduced Mana Cost per Endurance Charge
Gain Rampage while at Maximum Endurance Charges
Lose all Endurance Charges when Rampage ends

lines.flavourText:
Those who witness the shimmering scales of the wyrm
know only fear for the rest of their lives.
Fortunately, the rest of their lives
can be measured in seconds.

lines.name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: Ewar's Mirage

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks Chain an additional time when in Main Hand
Attacks fire an additional Projectile when in Off Hand
(40-55)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
A single breeze blows
A hundred blades dance

lines.name: Perseverance

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Attack Damage per 200 of the lowest of Armour and Evasion Rating

lines.flavourText:
"Some blows must be evaded. Some blows must be endured.
The trick is to tell them apart."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: The Baron

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Half of your Strength is added to your Minions
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies per 500 Strength
With at least 1000 Strength, (1.5-2)% of Damage dealt by your Raised Zombies is Leeched to you as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The Emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who 
practice the dark arts. Some of us are just more discreet."

lines.name: Ahn's Heritage

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
+2% to all maximum Resistances while you have no Endurance Charges
You have Onslaught while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
"It's not Karui, Azmeri or even Vaal in origin,
but one thing is certain. It is very, very old."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 46

lines.name: Auxium

explicitModifiers.text: Chill Effect and Freeze Duration on you are based on 100% of Energy Shield
(20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills per Power Charge
(0.2-0.24)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: As long as the soul is unfettered, so is the body.

lines.name: Bloodgrip

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra Damage

lines.flavourText:
Combat is simple.
Keep your blood in.
Take theirs out.

lines.name: Inya's Epiphany

explicitModifiers.text:
25% chance that if you would gain Power Charges, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Though the path we walk is the same,
each journey is different.

lines.name: Speaker's Wreath

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Minion Attack Speed per 50 Dexterity
2% increased Minion Movement Speed per 50 Dexterity
Minions' Hits can only Kill Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A strong pair of legs may carry you far,
but a silver tongue and a few brutes
can take you to the edge of the world.

lines.name: Soul Tether

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (4-7)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Vaal bloodpriests were among the earliest intellectuals on record. 
It was they who found that a newly freed soul would 
desperately cling to any other source of life.

lines.name: Maligaro's Cruelty

explicitModifiers.text: (25-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by at least 5 Poisons
(12-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by fewer than 5 Poisons
10% increased Damage with Poison per Frenzy Charge
3% increased Poison Duration per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"He does not love. He does not feel regret or remorse.
He does not think about consequences, only possibilities.
If that does not describe a monster, tell me: what does?"
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Eber's Unification

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Void Gaze when you use a Skill
Gain (5-8)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
The impediments of flesh are weak.
The air we breathe knows no such boundaries.
I exhale, and you inhale,
and inexorably we inch towards oneness.

lines.name: The Embalmer

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Vile Toxins

lines.flavourText:
"Decomposition takes hold too quickly!
No, if we are to keep the specimen in perfect shape,
we must begin the process before expiry."

lines.name: Taproot

explicitModifiers.text: 0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana against Poisoned Enemies
0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Maimed Enemies

lines.flavourText: Some things must die so that others can live.

lines.name: The Wasp Nest

explicitModifiers.text:
Attacks with this Weapon deal 80 to 120 added Chaos Damage against
Enemies affected by at least 5 Poisons

lines.flavourText:
To discover how cruel nature can be,
you need only shake the wrong branch.

lines.name: Debeon's Dirge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've used a Warcry Recently
150% increased Elemental Damage if you've used a Warcry Recently
Warcries Knock Back and Interrupt Enemies in a smaller Area

lines.flavourText:
A sharp and heavy beat,
discorded, out of tune,
when you hear it on the wind,
you know death will follow soon.

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Malachai's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (15-25) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed
Grants Malachai's Endurance, Frenzy and Power for 6 seconds each, in sequence

lines.flavourText: What man does not wish for immortality?

lines.name: Wraithlord

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems

lines.flavourText:
Countless men proclaimed themselves the masters of death,
and each one succumbed to it.

lines.name: Giantsbane

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-8) to (12-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The monstrous men of yore used bows too,
theirs were just bigger.

lines.name: White Wind

explicitModifiers.text: (100-200)% increased Cold Damage while your Off Hand is empty
+(30-40)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage while your Off Hand is empty

lines.flavourText:
The Maraketh fear very little, 
but they dare not whisper the name
of the demon that flies on Winter's gales.

lines.name: Cane of Unravelling

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-55)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
2% increased Cast Speed per Power Charge
+2 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
Gain a Power Charge after Spending a total of 200 Mana
Regenerate 2 Mana per Second per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Creation is the act of making the intangible tangible.
To work backwards, to make the tangible intangible,
is to step into the mind of a god."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Kalisa's Grace

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Casting
Gain +2% to Critical Strike Chance for 2 seconds after Spending a total of 800 Mana

lines.flavourText:
"You shall hang, in blissful agony, on my every note."
- Kalisa, Prima Donna of Sarn

lines.name: Oskarm

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Assassin's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy and have no Mark
2% increased Attack Critical Strike Chance per 200 Accuracy Rating

lines.flavourText:
Land and sea did not dissuade,
nor did the Kelpie's maw;
the wild beast crossed half the world
to sate his hungry claw.

lines.name: Bloodbond

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +(12-15)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

lines.name: Stormcharger
lines.flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

lines.name: Balefire
lines.flavourText:
After the fires swept down from the sky and swallowed the city,
all that lingered, as if locked in time,
was a memory of that which was gone, a whisper of deeds undone.

lines.name: Ahn's Contempt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (8-12)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage while at maximum Power Charges
You take 50% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes while you have no Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
"To touch it is to be overwhelmed with the need to carve your name into history.
A face no one remembers, yet once you have seen it, you will never forget."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 48

lines.name: Ahn's Might

explicitModifiers.text: +50% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have no Frenzy Charges
+(400-500) to Accuracy Rating while at Maximum Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
"Impossibly heavy, yet the ancient edge is as keen as any modern blade's.
A reminder that, in the end, when we lie in the bellies of worms,
it is what we make that makes us."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 47

lines.name: Mark of the Red Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Raging Spirits deal (175-250)% increased Damage
75% reduced Maximum number of Summoned Raging Spirits
Summoned Raging Spirits' Hits always Ignite

Summoned Raging Spirits' Melee Strikes deal Fire-only Splash
Damage to Surrounding Targets

lines.flavourText:
Gleeful are the few
who bask in the blood of the many.

lines.name: Gluttony

explicitModifiers.text: You have Culling Strike against Cursed Enemies
Gain (20-28) Life per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Gain (10-14) Mana per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Take (100-200) Physical Damage when you use a Movement Skill
You have no Armour or Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
What started as a desire to feed
became a desire to learn...

lines.name: Earendel's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Skeletons Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit
Summoned Skeletons take (15-30)% of their Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
Summoned Skeletons have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
There the weary multitude of man-kind 
shall turn in their masses into the wide fire, 
where the destroying flame embraces the living, 
some will go up, some down, filled with misery.

lines.name: Sinvicta's Mettle

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Area of Effect per 25 Rampage Kills
Gain a Frenzy Charge on every 50th Rampage Kill

lines.flavourText:
War is a thriving infection.
It numbs the heart and eats away at the soul
until only emptiness remains.

lines.name: Zeel's Amplifier

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently

lines.flavourText:
"Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis, 
is the only secret worth discovering." 
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

lines.name: The Eternal Apple

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill on losing Endurance Charges, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
You lose all Endurance Charges on reaching maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
The empire is both the tree and the fruit.
It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within,
and when the time is right, the apple is picked. 
The idea, and our ideals, take root.

lines.name: Curtain Call

explicitModifiers.text: Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Dexterity
Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Sing with me one last duet,
the curtain closes nigh.
Join me in a quiet song,
Before we all must die.

lines.name: Perquil's Toe

explicitModifiers.text: Lightning Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Lucky
Nearby Allies' Damage with Hits is Lucky

lines.flavourText: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

lines.name: Soulwrest

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Summon Phantasm Skill when you Consume a corpse
Minions deal (45-51) to (66-78) additional Physical Damage
If you Consumed a corpse Recently, you and nearby Allies Regenerate 5% of Life per second

lines.flavourText: Death is but the start of your servitude.

lines.name: The Primordial Chain

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to maximum number of Summoned Golems

lines.flavourText:
The leash of the lifegiver
binds in both directions.

lines.name: Demon Stitcher

explicitModifiers.text: Sacrifice (5-25)% of Life to gain that much Energy Shield when you Cast a Spell

lines.flavourText:
Xibaqua's treachery was met with divine fury.
One by one, the gods reclaimed their flesh,
until all that remained was a droplet of pure light:
The first Vaal.

lines.name: March of the Legion

explicitModifiers.text: +(3-5) to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 25 Divine Blessing

lines.flavourText: When the time comes to face evil, the faithful are never alone.

lines.name: Wreath of Phrecia

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Area of Effect at 50% of their value
Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Damage

lines.flavourText: The Light drove the darkness from our lands and from our hearts.

lines.name: Pillar of the Caged God

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per 20 Intelligence
16% increased Physical Weapon Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Forged to rule the waves and tide
Destined to serve the monkey's paw
Strong as a tower of iron
Deft as the needle doubt

lines.name: Sign of the Sin Eater

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies inflict Elemental Ailments on you instead of nearby Allies

lines.flavourText: A secret few among the Templars grant absolution by bearing the guilt of others.

lines.name: Aukuna's Will

explicitModifiers.text: Raised Zombies have (80-100)% increased maximum Life
Raise Zombie does not require a corpse
Your Raised Zombies count as corpses

lines.flavourText: The Black Sekhema's trial had only just begun.

lines.name: Torchoak Step

explicitModifiers.text: Totems Reflect 100% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage to nearby Enemies when Hit

lines.flavourText:
Centuries ago, there existed a unique grove imbued with ancestral fire.
As with all things, the Karui used its wood for war.

lines.name: Siegebreaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 5% chance to Taunt on Hit with Attacks
Your Minions spread Caustic Ground on Death, dealing 20% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Poison the land and they'll have nothing to defend.

lines.name: Triad Grip

explicitModifiers.text: Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Fire Damage per Red Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage per Green Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Chaos Damage per White Socket
Minions have (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

lines.flavourText: The secret of the elements lies within a square triangle.

lines.name: Venopuncture

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have 25% chance to cause Bleeding
You are Chilled while you are Bleeding
Non-Chilled Enemies you inflict Bleeding on are Chilled
Bleeding Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
There is a way to survive the bite of an ice snake,
but few have the resolve to attempt it.

lines.name: Icefang Orbit

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: You are Chilled when you are Poisoned
Non-Chilled Enemies you Poison are Chilled
Poisoned Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
Those members of the Brotherhood who employ the venom of 
Trarthan ice snakes must take great care with the volatile substance.

lines.name: The Black Cane

explicitModifiers.text: Each Summoned Phantasm grants you Phantasmal Might

lines.flavourText: Lead the army of the damned from the front.

lines.name: Painseeker

explicitModifiers.text: Critical Strikes do not inherently inflict non-Damaging Ailments
Inflict non-Damaging Ailments as though dealing (100-200)% more Damage

lines.flavourText: Lay bare paths to pain you never knew you had.

lines.name: Willowgift

explicitModifiers.text: You do not inherently take less Damage for having Fortification
+4% chance to Suppress Spell Damage per Fortification
(15-25)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while at maximum Fortification

lines.flavourText: The storm cannot break that which bends.

lines.name: Retaliation Charm

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
Blind does not affect your Light Radius
Blind you inflict is Reflected to you
(10-20)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Blinded

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.

lines.name: Great Old One's Tentacles

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
50% chance for Impales on Enemies you Kill to Reflect Damage to surrounding Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Under its influence, shards of metal take on a life of their own, wriggling into flesh,
burrowing into organs, and exploding outwards in search of other victims.

lines.name: Wings of Entropy

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Chaos Damage in Off Hand

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.name: Pyroshock Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Enemies Ignited by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Fire
Enemies Shocked by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Lightning

lines.flavourText: Teach a man to burn, and you'll be warm for the rest of his life.

lines.name: The Ephemeral Bond

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've gained a Power Charge Recently
(1-2) to (36-40) Lightning Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
For how little time they had together,
their love was all the more powerful.

lines.name: The Highwayman

explicitModifiers.text: Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled

lines.flavourText: Somebody does have to get hurt.

lines.name: The Druggery

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks gain 1 Charge every 3 seconds
100% of Life Recovery from Flasks is applied to nearby Allies instead of You

lines.flavourText:
"This will help with the pain.
One for you... and one for me."
- Doctor 'Shaky Hands' Opden

lines.name: Willclash

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Spell Damage per Power Charge
(3-5)% increased Elemental Damage per Power charge
Gain a Power Charge every Second if you haven't lost Power Charges Recently
Lose all Power Charges when you Block

lines.flavourText: Obtaining information depends upon pretending one already has it.

lines.name: Mercenary's Lot

explicitModifiers.text: Mark Skills have (10-15)% increased Cast Speed
(30-50)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Marked Enemy
Your Mark Transfers to another Enemy when Marked Enemy dies

lines.flavourText: The target changes, but the job's always the same.

lines.name: The Ghastly Theatre

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
Triggers Level 20 Physical Aegis when Equipped
(8-15)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while Physical Aegis is depleted
(50-70)% increased Critical Strike Chance while Physical Aegis is depleted
Nearby Enemies are Blinded while Physical Aegis is not depleted

lines.flavourText:
Never let the audience know your true form. Misdirect them,
beguile them. Strike when they least expect it.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Resolve

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Avoid being Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

lines.name: Goblinedge

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% increased Attack Speed if you haven't gained a Frenzy Charge Recently
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance if you haven't gained a Power Charge Recently
+3 seconds to Duration of Frenzy and Power Charges on Culling Strike

lines.flavourText:
"That bronze girl sure knows how to cut someone down to size!"
- Bertrand the Plush

lines.name: Usurper's Penance

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have 15% chance to cause Bleeding
+4% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding per Frenzy Charge
Bleeding you inflict deals Damage 4% faster per Frenzy Charge
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Critical Strike at Close Range

lines.flavourText: Bloodlust begets suffering.

lines.name: The Oppressor

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to amount of Suppressed Spell Damage Prevented
You take 20% of Damage from Blocked Hits

lines.flavourText: Every clash leaves one more scar.

lines.name: Blackgleam

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Fire Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

lines.name: Saemus' Gift
lines.flavourText:
Beaten in contest, he would try once more
Guided by magic, Magjar took aim at a dove
Saemus' gift would influence the score
Guided by darkness, Magjar spilled the blood of his love

lines.name: Asphyxia's Wrath

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies within 3 metres when Hexed Enemy dies
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies in a range of 30 when Hexed Enemy dies

lines.flavourText:
Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

lines.name: Scorpion's Call

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (150-200) Life per Second while in Blood Stance
(40-60)% increased Projectile Damage while in Blood Stance
+(700-1000) to Evasion Rating while in Sand Stance
(20-30)% increased Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
(25-30)% increased Attack Speed if you've changed Stance Recently

lines.flavourText: Claws open, brace for a bite. Stinger raised, dodge or die.

lines.name: Maloney's Nightfall

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

explicitModifiers.text: (8-10) to (14-16) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
25% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

lines.name: Ghostwrithe

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Faith springs abundant at the edge of death.

lines.name: Elevore

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (100-200) Life when you Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ancient worshippers of the Greatwolf were overtaken
by a ravenous hunger for all things mystical.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Kongming's Stratagem

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Fog of War when your Trap is triggered
(30-50)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
30% reduced Spell Damage taken from Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered.
Those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. 
Thus the wise win before they fight, 
while the ignorant fight to win.

lines.name: Allelopathy
lines.flavourText:
"Nothing is more natural than competition.
One feasts, another starves.
One blossoms, another withers.
And one cannot catch the golden sunlight
without casting a bitter shadow."
- Cadiro Perandus

lines.name: Manastorm

explicitModifiers.text:
When you Cast a Spell, Sacrifice all Mana to gain Added Maximum Lightning Damage
equal to 25% of Sacrificed Mana for 4 seconds

lines.flavourText: Fear not the fury of the storm.

lines.name: Doedre's Tongue

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Cursed Enemies cannot inflict Elemental Ailments on You

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro did the cutting... at her request.
In the new void, a malevolent power emerged.

lines.name: Ashcaller

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 10 Summon Raging Spirit on Kill
Adds (20-24) to (38-46) Fire Damage to Spells
10% chance to Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Chain of Endurance

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects (100-150) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
Regenerate 2% of Life per second for each different Ailment affecting you

lines.flavourText:
"A man confronted with sufficient adversity
may ascend to unprecedented heights
and triumph over his coddled rivals."
- Weylan the Ezomyte

lines.name: Orbala's Stand

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Stunned by Suppressed Spell Damage
Debilitate Enemies for 4 Seconds when you Suppress their Spell Damage

lines.flavourText:
The inferno surged past, devastating Stridevolf, but the Maraketh
warrior somehow remained. Soot-blackened and resolute, she
grinned. In that moment, the bandit king knew true despair.

lines.name: Stormseeker

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Effect of Chills you inflict while Leeching Mana
(60-100)% increased Effect of Shocks you inflict while Leeching Energy Shield
Unaffected by Chill while Leeching Mana
Unaffected by Shock while Leeching Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The fundamental forces of our world are secrets
to be uncovered by the intelligent and the capable.
Like all secrets, they, too, can be stolen.

lines.name: Storm Prison

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (9-11) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: (25-35)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
You can never truly tame the tempest.
You can barely even leash it.

lines.name: Bloodsoaked Medallion

explicitModifiers.text:
Every 10 seconds:
Gain 2% of Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks for 5 seconds
Gain 5% of Life per Enemy Killed for 5 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"Atziri ordained that we exploit the weaknesses inherent in our slaves.
With relish, we did exactly as she instructed."
- Guatelitzi, Architect of Flesh

lines.name: Ceinture of Benevolence

explicitModifiers.text: Non-Unique Utility Flasks you Use apply to Linked Targets

lines.flavourText:
"Put your faith in me.
Our god demands it."
- High Templar Maxarius

lines.name: Soulbound

explicitModifiers.text: Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Cast Speed
Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Skill Effect Duration
Linked Targets Cannot Die for 2 seconds after you Die
Lose no Experience when you die because a Linked target died

lines.flavourText:
"Slay my twin and I will inherit her wisdom.
Slay me and her life will be prolonged by my demise.
Our souls are eternally bound by the sacrifices we have made."
- High Priest Atazek

lines.name: Blood Price

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemy Monsters have at least 8% of Life Reserved

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye makes the whole world dead.

lines.name: Eclipse Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: (120-140)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Every decade, Lunaris devours Solaris
Each time, Solaris emerges from Lunaris, born anew.

lines.name: Piscator's Vigil

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon have (100-115)% increased Elemental Damage
Damage with Weapons Penetrates 5% Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
"Stone still, amidst the reeds,
breath fogging in the iron cold air. 
he sits, he waits, he watches. 
A piscatorial vigil, sat by the river, 
his cathedral, his patience his unanswered prayer."
- Jojoba Mansell, bard, angler, adventurer

lines.name: Obliteration

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Enemies you Kill have a 20% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
We forge order from the world around us
Wielding anarchy and destruction as our tools of genesis.

lines.name: Ikiaho's Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks used while on Low Life apply Recovery Instantly
Mana Flasks used while on Low Mana apply Recovery Instantly

lines.flavourText: Even the loneliest of souls can aid a friend in times of darkness.

lines.name: Bound Fate

explicitModifiers.text:
Every 5 seconds, gain one of the following for 5 seconds:
Your Hits are always Critical Strikes
Hits against you are always Critical Strikes
Attacks cannot Hit you
Attacks against you always Hit
Your Damage with Hits is Lucky
Damage of Hits against you is Lucky

lines.flavourText:
Knowing what will happen
and knowing when it will happen
are two very different things.

lines.name: Contract: Breaking the Unbreakable
lines.flavourText:
...the blueprints for my Extreme Warmth Beam, my Storm Wooing Rod,
the Mind Sublimator, and the Unbreakable...!

lines.name: Contract: The Slaver King
lines.flavourText:
"There can be no freedom
while hate still reigns."
